manzils.text: Nditsuba khubemaanga khulunyaali
Nende khubalia bakaninjia amabii
Nende khubalia basoomanga obwitsulisio
Toto Nyasaye wenyu nimulala butswa
Nyasaye Omulesi welikulu nende eshialo nende ebili hakari wabio. Ne ni Nyasaye Omulesi we ebukwe tsiosi
Toto efwe khwarona likulu liahambi khutsing’ining’ini
Khulwokhulinda okhurulana nende buli Shetani Omukhayi
Balanyoola okhuwulila ebilonje bioluyali, ne baloondungwayo buli mumbeka
Baloondungwa ne bali nende eshinyasio shilawa
Halali ulia upusulanga eshindu eshititi , ne mana shimulondangakhwo eshikhupo shimesamesanga
Barebekhwo mbu koo abo ni baloongwa okhuloongwa okhutinyu muno okhushila ebilonje bindi biakhwaloonga? Toto efwe khwabaloonga okhurulana khuliloba litilanga
Owukanga nabo bakholanga omubayo
Ne nibetsulisibwa shibetsulilanga tawe
Ne nibalola eshimanyisio nibakhola omubayo
Ne baboola mbu: “kano shinishiosi shiosi tawe halali ni obulosi butswa buli habulafu.”
Mbunikhufwanikhumalileokhubaliloba nende ebikumba, kho toto khulilamusibwa
Kata bapapa befu bakhale
Boola mbu: “mmm! nanyu nimuli batutuyibwe .”
Eyo oluyoka lulikhupwa lulala butswa, ni hawo niwo abalilola
Baliboola mbu: “ abayiee, ino niyo inyanga yomurungo.”
Ino niyo inyanga yeyindukho yamwakhayanga
Bakhung’asie boosi bakhola amabii nende abakhasi babu nende balia boosi babalaamanga
Nibakhaya okhulaama Nyasaye bachomie khunjila yomulilo kwa Jahannam
Mana mubeemie. Totobo balarebwa
“Mubeele murie? Shichila shina nimulakhoonyana?”
Halali olwalelo balaloonda lilako
Balihengana abeene khubeene nibarebana
Baliboola mbu: “ toto enywe mwakhwitsilanga okhurula omukhono omulunji”
Balibakalusia mbu: “Halali enywe abeene shimwali Abasuubili tawe.”
“Efwe shikhwali nobunyali khwinywe tawe halali enywe abeene mwali abakori”
Mana omuse kwa Nyasaye wefu Omulesi kumalile okhubura. Toto efwe khulapila butswa eshinyasio
Khwabakosia eshichila mbu fwesi khwali abakori
Toto abo inyanga eyo balisaanga halala mushinyasio
Endio nilwakhulikholela Abamabii
Olwa baboolelungwa mbu: “abulaho Nyasaye ulaamwa khubwatoto halali Nyasaye Mulala butswa- besuunganga
Baboolanga mbu efwe khuleshesa Abanyasaye befu okhubeela Omukaasi wetsinyimbo wuno Omulalu
Halali ye yetsa khubwatoto ne afuchilisania nende Abarumwa
Toto enywe mulipila eshinyasio eshilulu
Ne shimulirungwa tawe halali kalia akamwakholanga
Halali Abasumba ba Nyasaye abalobole
Abo nibo balinyoola omukabo omubiishe
Ebiamo , nabo balihebwa oluyali
Mumikunda chobwokholo
Baliba khubisaala nibahengane
Balibotokhanilibwa eshisanda shieshinywebwa shieyisebele
Eshinywebwa eshilafu , eshimilimili khu ushinywa
Shibula obubii , nohomba shishibameesia tawe
Ne baliba nende Abakhasi betsimoni tsietsisoni tsindayi
Abakhasi shinga amabuyu kaliindwa
Baliinjila bachake , okhureebana abeene khubeene
Aliboola omubooli mulala mubo: “toto esie ndali nende Omwitsa.”
Yambolelanga mbu: “lano ewe ulimubafuchililanga?”
‘‘Mbu nikhufwa khwaba liloba nende ebikumba, mbu khulirungwa mana khwabalwa?’’
Aliboola mbu: “ laano enywe mulola murie?”
Mana alimuhenga kho alimulola hakari wa Jahannam
Aliboola mbu: “wallahi, Nyasaye mulala wali ahambi okhungosia.”
Tsikhayanga okhuba tsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye wanje omulesi ndakhabeele mubalia abenjisibwamwo
Koo! Efwe shikhulifwa tawe
Halali okhufwa khwefu khwokhuranga, nafu shikhulinyoola eshinyasio tawe
Toto	khuno	nikho	okhubura okhukhongo
Ne	shinga kano, nikabakhole balia bakhola
Koo okhubukanilwa endi shinokhulayi nohomba omusaala kwa Zaquum
Toto efwe khwakukhola okhuba eshinyasio khubalia abamabii
Toto oko ni omusaala kurulanga hakari wa Jahannamu
Ebibuli bie biamo biakwo bili shinga omurwe kwa mashetani
Toto abo balilia ebiamo ebo mana betsusie tsinda tsiabu
Mana khu ako belesibwe amaatsi kayile karabachila
Mana obwatoto amakalushilo kabu kaliba Jahannam
Toto bo banyoola Basabwe nibakora
Nabo nibakhola lwangu okhuloonda amaseenelo kabu
Ne khubwatoto bamala okhukora imbeli wabu Abandu bakhale abaanji
Ne toto efwe khwabarumila abekanyilisi
Mana henga olole shingala indukho yabalia ebekanyilisibwa
Halali Abasumba ba Nyasaye abalobole
Ne toto Nuhu Yakhulaanga , ne efwe khuli abalayi po abafuchililanga
Ne nikhumuhabina ye halala nende Abandu be okhurulana nende amasila amakhongo
Mana nikhukhola olwibulo lulwe okhutoong’a
Mana nikhulekha ifuma indayi khubetsa inyuma wuwe
Omuleembe kube khu Nuhu mushialo shioosi
Toto endio nilwakhurunganga abakholi bamalayi
Toto ye ali Mubasumba befu Abasuubili
Mana Abandi abo nikhubasishia mumatsi
Ne toto Ibrahim yali mumukaanda kukwe
Olwa yetsela Nyasaye wuwe Omulesi nende Omwoyo kukwe kwoosi
Olwa yaboolela Papa wuwe nende Abandu bebe mbu: “nishina shiamulamaanga?”
Eminyasaye chiobubeyi echilali Nyasaye nichiamwenyanga?”
‘‘Mupariranga shina Nyasaye Omulesi webilonje bioosi?”
Mana nasitia tsimoni okhuhenga tsing’ining’ini
Naboola mbu: “toto esie endwala.”
Nabo nibamulekha nibamufutarira omukongo
Mana nabwondela Eminyasaye chiabu. Nachiboolela mbu: “shichila shina nimulaliitsanga?’’
‘‘Mubeele murie amulalomalomanga tawe?’’
Mana nachikalukhanila nachikhupa nomukhono omulunji
Mana nibamwitsila lwangu lwangu
Naboola mbu: “ enywe mulaamanga ebindu bia mwiraanyanga abeene?”
Ne Nyasaye niye wabaloonga halala nende akamukholanga ako
Nenibaboola mbu mumumbashile eshiumbashe mana mumusukune mumulilo
Benya okhumukholela amabii halali nikhubakhola bo okhuba bahasi
Ne naboola mbu : “ toto esie ewuya enzia ewa Nyasaye wanje Omulesi, ye alalunjisia”
Ewe Nyasaye wanje Omulesi, mbelesie ulia uli mubakholi bamalayi
Mana nikhumusubisia Omwana Omwihotselefu

Olwa yoola eshichelo shiokhuchenda ninaye yamuboolela mbu: “ewe mwana wanje , toto esie endutsi mumaloro mbu ekhusinzanga, kho hengamwo olola orie?” naboola mbu: “ ewe papa wanje, khola shinga olomesibungwa witsa okhunyoola Nyasaye nachama nendi mubalia befwiila”
Kho boosi babili olwa behotselesia , mana namukonelia obweni
Nikhumulanga mbu : “ewe Ibrahim!”
Omalileokhukholahabwenikhumaloro ako, toto endio nilwakhurunganga Abakholi bamalayi
Toto kano ni amatemo kali habulafu
Mana nikhumuhelesia eshisinzo shioluyali
Mana nikhuleshela ifuma indayi khubetsa inyuma
Omulembe kube khu Ibrahim
Endio nilwakhurunganga Abakholi bamalayi
Toto ye ali Mubandu befu basuubila
Ne nikhumusuubisia okhwibulwa khwa Is’haaq, naye ni Omurumwa womubandu Abalayi
Mana nikhumuhelesia tsimbabaasi ye nende Is’haaq. Ne mulwibulo lwabu nibarulamwo Abandu abalayi nende balia bakhola amabii khumioyo chiabu habulafu
Netoto khwakholela obulayi Musa nende Harun
Nikhumuhabina halala nende Abandu babu okhurulana nende obutinyu obukhongo
Mana nikhubahabina nibaba nibo abashila
Ne nikhuhelesia babili abo eshitabu shinoosinjia
Mana	nikhubalunjisia	khunjila ingololofu
Mana nikhubaleshela ifuma indayi khubalia betsa inyuma wabu
Omulembe kube khu Musa nende Harun
Toto endio nilwakhurunganga balia abalayi
Toto babili abo bali Mubasumba befu abalayi
Ne toto Elyas yali Mubarumwa
Olwa yaboolela Abandu bebe mbu: “shimuritsanga tawe?”
Mulaamanga Baal ( eshimoosi shieidhahabu) ne mulekha omuloonji mwene
Nyasaye Omulesi wenyu nende wa bapapa benyu bakhale
Mana nibamuyingasia. Ne toto balikhung’asibwa (mumulilo)
Halali	Abasumba	ba	Nyasaye Abatswunulwa
Mana nikhubaleshela ifuma indayi khubalia betsa inyuma wabu
Omulembe kube khu Ilyas
Toto endio nilwakhurunganga balia Abalayi
Toto ye ali Mubasumba befu Abasuubila
Ne toto Luti ali Mubarumwa
Olwa khwamuhabina halala nende Abandu baye boosi
Halali Omukhasi omushiele owali mubatong’a inyuma
Mana nikhusishia abandi abo
Ne toto enywe mubaburangakhwo mumabwibwi
Nende	eshilo,	mana	kho shimukharetsangakhwo mubwongo tawe
Ne toto Yunus yali mulala khubarumwa
Olwa yelushila muliaro litsule
Mana nibasanjilana mumakhuwa, mana nikamukwiila
Mana inyeni nimumila naye nali ufunaanibwa
Ne akhayanga okhuba mubalia abetsoominjia Nyasaye
Yakhamenyele munda mwayo okhuula inyanga yokhulamusibwa mubafu
Mana nikhumusukuna khulukuku, naye nali omulwale
Nenikhumumesilia omumela kwelihondo
Ne khwamuruma khubandu iyelefu imia ndala nohomba bashilaho awo
Mana nibasuubila nenikhubara mubwokholo okhula okhufwa khwabu
Ne bareebe mbu: “ Nyasaye wuwo niye uli nende Abana abakhana nabo babe nende Abana abasiani
Nohomba khwaloonga Abamalaika okhuba beshikhasi nabo nibalola
Ne toto manya mbu khububeyi bwabu baboolanga mbu
“Nyasaye yebula” ne toto obo ni obubeyi
Oh, yalobola Abana beshikhana okhushila beshisiani
Baane mulimurie? Mubusinjia murie
Ohh shimuparangakhwo tawe
Nohomba muli nende eshifune shiatoto
Mana nakharerekhwo eshitabu shienyu (itaurati) nikali mbu muboolanga obwatoto
Ne baraho okhwinjilana khwolwikho hakari waye nende Amajini, ne Amajini kamala okhumanya mbu toto (baboolanga bario) balikhung’asibwa (mumililo)
Oluyali ni lwa Nyasaye , Nyasaye	nomutswenufu	muno khukabamuchishilanga
Halali Abasumba ba Nyasaye Abatswenufu
Mana enywe nende abamulamanga
Shimunyala okhubakosia tawe
Halali ulia ulinjila mumulilo
Ne habulaho yesiyesi mwifwe halali alinende habundu wuwe amanyikhane
Ne toto efwe nefwe khwemaanga olunyaali
Ne toto nefwe betsoominjia
Ne baliho balia baboolanga mbu
‘‘Khubeetsangakhwo nende ametsulisio ka Abandu bakhale (bebitabu)
Toto khwakhabeele Abasumba ba Nyasaye Abatswenufu.’’
Halali	(olwashitabu	shiabetsela) bashikhaya mana hambi hano nibalole
Ne toto likhuwa liefu liamala okhuranjilila khubasumba befu Abarumwa
Mbu abo toto nibo balihabinwa
Ne omukanda kwefu kwabalwani niko kulishila
Kho baleshe butswa khubise ebititi
Ne bahenje butswa, ahambi hano balitsa okhumanya
Koo eshinyasio shia Nyasaye nishio shiabayungubasinjia
Kho eshinyasio olwashilibeshela mushikuri, iliba itsuli imbi khubalia bekanyilisibwa
Kho baleshesa khubise bititi
Ne bahenje butswa nabo balitsa okhumanya
Nyasaye Omulesi nomutswenufu muno okhurulana khukabamuchishilanga
Ne omulembe kube Khubarumwa
Ne oluyali lwoosi nilwa Nyasaye Omulesi wabiloonje bioosi
Swad. Nditsuba khu Ikurani eyili nende ametsulisio
Halali Abakhayi bali mwikhwilola nende obuyingani
Ni emikanda chinga chiakhwasishia imbeli wabu niboopa obuyoka , ne ebise biokhuwonibwa biali biburire
Ne bawuka mbu Omwikanyilisi okhurula mubo okhubetsela , mana nibaboola mbu: “uno ni Omulosi Omubeyi.”
Eh! akholele Abanyasaye okhuba Nyasaye mulala yenyene! Toto kano ni amakhuwa khokhuchenyia
Mana Abakhongo babu nibarula nibababoolela mbu: “mutsie mana mutinyesa Khubanyasaye benyu, toto endio nilwakenyekhana.”
Efwe shikhwawulilakhwo kano mushima shiefu shiokhumalilikha tawe, ne kano shineshindu tawe halali ni obuchishi butswa
Mbu niye butswa weshilibwa amekanyilisio mwifwe. Halali abo bali nende eshibeyibeyi khu amekanyilisio kanje, ne mana bashili okhupila eshinyasio shianje
Nohomba bali nende ebiachi bietsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi, Owa amani Khakaba
Nohomba bo bali nende obwami bwomwikulu nende khushialo nende ebili hakari wabio? Khomana banine tsinjila tsiokhutsia eyo
Oko niko omukanda kwabalwani kulishilwa mumikanda chilia chilishilwa
Bayingana inyuma wabu Abandu ba Nuhu, nende babu A’di nende Firaun owali nende ebiumbashe
Nende Thamud nende Abandu ba Luti nende Abandu bomumutsuru. Echo nichio emikanda
Abo boosi bayingasia Abarumwa mana nibakhoyeshela eshinyasio
Ne bano shiabalindangasa ni oluyoka lulala butswa olulali ehale tawe
Nabo baboolanga mbu: “Nyasaye wefu Omulesi khurerere eshinyasio shiefu inyanga yeyindukho nishili okhuula.”
Wisumilisie khukababoolanga ako, ne witsulile Omusumba wefu Daudi Owa amani. Toto ye yali omunji wokhusaba eshileshelo
Netoto khwahotselesia ebikulu halala ninaye nibitsoomia ingolobe nende mumabwibwi halala ninaye
Ne kata amayoni kakhung’asibwa emikanda nemikanda, koosi kali amehotselefu khuye
Ne nikhumeta amani obwami bubwe, ne nikhumuwa amachesi nende obumanyi bwokhubusia omuse
Ne koo wawulikhwo olukano lwabasoolani olwa bekalilwa okhwinjila munzu

Olwa benjila wa Daudi , naye nabaria, nibaboola mbu: “olaria tawe, efwe khuli abasoolani babili, mulala wefu akosele owashie, mana okhukabukhasie khubwatoto , ne olakwila elubeka tawe, ne okhulunjisie khunjila yo bwatoto

Toto uno ni Omusiani wefu, ali nende amakondi amakhasi amakhumi tisa nende tisa, nasi endisa nende likondi lilalasa lieshikhasi, mana aboolanga mbu :“mbelesie elilio elo ekhuruchile” (nasi shindenya tawe) ne yashilile khumakhuwa

Toto ye akholele obubii okhusaba likondi lilio okhumeta khukeke, netoto abeyisanga abanji bakholelanga obubii khubeene, halali balia basuubila mana nibakhola amalayi nenibatiti mubo. Mana Daudi nalola mbu khumukholeele amatemo, nasaba eshileshelo khu Nyasaye wuwe, mana nakwa hasi okhwihotselesia khu Nyasaye wuwe nende okhumukalushila
Mana nikhumuleshela ako, netoto ye alinende eshisaala eshikhongo nende habundu halayi alikalukha khwifwe

Ewe Daudi toto efwe khwakhukhola okhuba omulindi wefu khushialo, kho khalaka emise chia Abandu khubwatoto ne olalonda obwikombi bwomwoyo bwakhukosia khunjila ya Nyasaye , toto balia balekha injila ya Nyasaye abo balinyoola eshinyasio eshilulu khulwa okhubula oluchendo khwabu muyinyanga yokhubalilwa
Ne shiwalonga likulu nende eshialo nende ebili hakari wabio eshikhaya tawe. Ako ni amaparo kabakhayi. Bali nende eshinyasio eshilulu Abakhayi abo mumulilo kubalinyoola
Nohomba khukhole balia basubila babe shinga balia bakholanga amabii khushialo, nohomba khukhole abaria Nyasaye shinga abetsimbii
Eshitabu shino shakhwakhwishilia ewe shilimwo tsimbabaasi tsinyinji, kho banyoole okhupaara mutsinyaali tsiashio, ne bobwoongo banyoole okhuwulila
Ne khwahelesia Dawudi Suleiman yali Omusumba omulayi muno, toto ye yali omunji wokhukalushila Nyasaye
Olwa yarumilwa ingolobe tsifarasi tsiwulelanga nitsiemele,	tsinyangu okhutsunukha
Mana naboola mbu : “esie ndachama ebindu ebilayi khulwa okhwitsulila Nyasaye wanje, mana (tsifarasi etso) nitsifisa inyuma weshikalilo. (Suleiman niyenya mbu atsilole khandi)
Mutsikalusie khwisie , mana nachaka okhutsitilakhwo mwikosi nende khubilenje
Mana nikhura Suleiman mumatemo, nenikhura omubili khushisaala shishie, mana nakalukha okhusaba eshileshelo
Naboola mbu: “Nyasaye wanje undeshele ne umbelesie obwaami bwo mundu wundi alalinyoola inyuma wanje tawe, toto ewe newe Omuwani.’’
Mana nikhukhola omuyeka okhumurumushila,	kwachendanga khumunwa kukwe, hosi hosi ayenya okhuula
Mana nikhukhola amashetani okhumurumushila, koosi kombakhanga nende keyibilanga
Nende abaandi boboyungwa khuminyororo
Shino ni eshihanwa shiefu, kho mana rusia nohomba shitiile, shibula eshichelo
Ne toto ye ali nende oluyali okhwinjisibwa ewefu, nende habundu halayi muno wokhukalukha
Ne yitsulila Omusumba wefu Ayub, olwa yalanga Nyasaye wuwe mbu: “ toto esie shetani yanderere obusinyifu nende obusandi.”
Nyasaye namuboolela mbu : “sieba hasi eshilenje shishio (isebele nirundukha hasi awo) kho amatsi amanyifu ko khwisinga wisinje ngako, nende kokhunywa onywe.”
Mana nikhumuhelesia Abandu bebe nende abandi shinga abo, nende tsimbabaasi tsirula khwifwe, nende eshitsulisio khubaandu bobwongo

Ne bukula mumukhono kukwo olusaala , omukhupile (omukhaye wuwo khulwokhwitsuba khwa wetsuba- khumabii kayakhola) ne olafunaka eshitsubo tawe. Toto kwamunyoola nali Omwifwiili Omusumba Omulayi, toto yali Omwisumilisi muno
Ne yitsulila Omusumba wefu Ibrahim nende Is’haaq nende Yaqub bali ba amaani nende amachesi
Toto efwe khwabalobola khulikhuwa lilayi muno liokhwitsulila mwikulu
Ne toto abo bali khwifwe Mubandu abalobole abalayi
Ne yitsulila Ismail nende Alyasa nende dhil kifli ne abo boosi bali Mubandu abalayi
Kano ni ametsulisio ne toto bwene balia baria Nyasaye habundu wabu wokhukalukha aliba alayi muno
Emikunda chomwikulu echilaliwa, chilikulwa emiliango shichila bo
Omo baliyiekhamwo nibalaanga ebiamo ebinji nende ebinywebwa ebilayi po
Ne baliba nabakhaye babu abasangasia tsimoni , abolubaka lulala
Kano niko kamwalakwa [okhunyoola] inyanga yokhubalwa
Toto kuno niko umukabo kwefu okulawetsaanga tawe
Endio nilwakaliba netoto balia baruumanga olwakho amakalushilo kabu kaliba amabii
Jahannam balinjilamwo, nabo ni obukono obubii muno bwakhukonakhwo
Endio nilwakaliba mana banywemwo amatsi komulilo nende kamafila
Nende ebinyasio bindi ngabino ebinji
Kuno niko omukanda kulinjila halala ninanyu, balibula okhwinjisibwa obulayi, toto abo balinjila mumulilo
Baliboola mbu : “enywe nenywe mubula amwinjila halayi, nenywe mwachila nikhunyoola eshinyasio, kho muli Abandu ababii muno.”
Baliboola mbu: “ Nyasaye wefu balia bachila nikhunyoola kano bameete eshinyasio mara khabili mumulilo. “
Mana ababii balia balireeba mbu: “kabeele karie akhulalolanga Abandu bakhwabalilanga mubabii mumulilo kuno?”
Koo khwababayila nohomba tsimoni tsiefu nitsilalolanga
Toto kano okhusolana khuno khwa Abandu bomumuliro nitoto
Boola mbu: “esie endisa Omwikanyilisi, ne abulaho Nyasaye wundi owulali Nyasaye mulala Owamani muno. ”
Nyasaye welikulu nende eshialo nende bili hakari wabio Owamaani muno, Omunji weshileshelo
Boola kano ni amacheni amakhongo muno aka enywe mukhayanga
Ka enywe mubula ninako oluchendo. [enywe nanyu mukakhayanga]
Shindali nende obumanyi kebilonje ebikhongo bioluyali olwabiayingananga
Ndahebwa obufimbuli shichila esie endi Omwikanyilisi Owabulafu
Olwa Nyasaye wuwo yaboolela Abamalaika mbu: “esie enonjele Omundu okhurula khuliloba.”
Kho olwandalamukasia mana emufuramwo omwoyo okhurulana ninasi kho mumwinamile khukhumuwulila
Abamalaika boosi nibeenama- halala
Halali Iblisi yaba Omufuru mana naba mubakhayi
Nyasaye namureeba mbu ; “Ewe Iblis shina shikhukayiile okhwinamila khushienonjele nende emikhono chianje, ofurire nohomba oli mubakhongo?”
Shetani naboola ‘Esie endi omulayi okhumushila ye, waloonga esie okhurulana khu muliro naye nomulonga okhurula khuliloba.”
Nyasaye namuboolela mbu: “’mana rula muno ewe oli neshitsubo.”
Ne eshitsubo shianje shikhulikhwo okhula inyanga yomurungo
Iblis naboola: ‘Nyasaye wanje mbelesie obwiyangu ndalafwa tawe okhula inyanga yokhulamusibwa mubafu
Nyasaye namuboolela; ‘‘mana ekhuhelesiyie obwiyangu.’’
Okhula khubise bieyinyanga imanyishe
Iblis naboola mbu: ‘‘nditsuba khumaani koko toto nditsa okhukosia boosi [Abana ba Adam]”
Halali Abasumba bobo abatswenufu mubo
Nyasaye naboola mbu “Toto, ne emboola obwatoto
Ndiliitsusia Jahanam khu ewe nende balia boosi balikhuloonda mubo.”
Boola mbu “ esie shebareba omurungo kwosikwosi tawe nohomba esie shendi omunichilisia tawe
Kano ni ametsulisio butswa Khubandu
Ne toto mulamanya amacheni kaye ahambi hano
Okhwishibwa khweshitabu shino khurulana nende Nyasaye Owamani Owamachesi muno
Toto efwe khwakhwishilia eshitabu shino khubwatoto, kho mulaame Nyasaye yenyene mubutswenufu khu Dini yiyie butswa

Toto Idini yabwene ni ya Nyasaye butswa, ne balia abeliindanga khu ulali Nyasaye nibaboola mbu: “ shikhubalamaanga tawe halali bakhusitie ahambi nende Nyasaye,” toto Nyasaye alibakabula khu kalia akabawukhananga. Toto Nyasaye shaluunjisinjia omubeeyi omukhayi tawe
Nyasaye yenyanga okhuba nende Omwana yakhaloboole mubiloonje bibie owayenya, oluyali ni olulwe, niye Nyasaye mulala ukholanga liayenya

Yaloonga likulu nende eshialo khubwatoto, ufuunikhanga eshiloo khushiteere, nende eshiteere khushiloo, mana nakhola eliuba nende omwesi mubiikhonyele , bioosi bichendanga khubise biarebwaho, manye mbu niye Owa amani Omulesheli muno

Yaloonga okhurula Khumundu mulala, mana namurusiamwo owashie, mana nabarerera ebiruche ebisatsa nende ebikhasi tsimbia munane, abaloonganga mutsinda tsia banyinenywe oshiloonje okhutsia khushindi, mubiilima bitaru. Oyo niye Nyasaye Omulesi wenyu, obwami nobubwe, abulaho Nyasaye wundi owulali ye tawe, kho nanyu mulinjibungwa heena

Ni mukhaya toto Nyasaye ni omuyinda khwinywe, ne shachamilanga Abasumba bebe obukhayi tawe, ne nimumwitsoomia alabafuchilila ne Omundu shalichinga obusiro bwo owashie tawe, mana mulikalukha ewa Nyasaye wenyu Omulesi, ne alibaboolela akamwakholanga toto ye ni Omumanyi muno khukali mubilifi

Ne Omundu nanyoola amasila kosikosi asaba Nyasaye wuwe namukalushila, ne namuhelesia tsimbabaasi okhurula ewuwe yebilila akayasabanga imbeli mana natsokasia Nyasaye nende Abanyasaye bandi mbu kho akosie Abandu khu injila yiye, wikhoye nende obukhayi bubwo hatiti, toto ewe oli mubaandu bomumulilo

Koo ulia ulaamanga eshilo Nyasaye wuwe niyeema niyenama mana naba noburi khu inyanga imalilishi, ne nasuubila okhunyoola tsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye wuwe. Boola mbu:“ bakhaba nashilala abamanyile nende abalamanyile tawe, toto abachesi nibobetsulilanga.’’

Boola enywe Abasumba banje basuubila, murie Nyasaye wenyu Omulesi, balia bakhola amalayi khushialo khuno balinyoola amalayi, ne eshialo shia Nyasaye neshiyaangufu, toto abesumilisi balihebwa omurungo kwabu okhubura eshichelo
Boola mbu: “esie ndalomesibwa okhulaama Nyasaye mubutswenufu
Ne ndalomesibwa okhuba weyimbeli mubasalamu
Boola mbu: “ esie eritsaanga eshinyasio shie inyanga ikhongo nekhaya okhuloonda ka Nyasaye Omulesi wanje.”
Ni Nyasaye butswa wenaamanga nemutswenushila
Kho lame shia mwenya owulali Ye. Boola mbu: “toto balia abatiba mana nibatibia emioyo chiabu inyanga yeyindukho,” koo manye mbu, okho nikho okhutiba khwa habulafu
Baliba nende ebichelo biomulilo biawukhane hekulu nende hasi wabu, endio nilwa Nyasaye arisia Abandu bebe, enywe abasumba banje muurie
Ne balia basita ehale khubulaami bwobukori mana nibamukalushila Nyasaye, basuubisibwa obulayi imbeli wa Nyasaye , subisia Abasumba banje
Balia bawulilanga likhuwa mana nibaloonda lilia lilayi lialio, abo nibo ba Nyasaye yalunjisia, ne abo nibo bamachesi
Ne ulia okhoyeshele okhunyoola omurungo kweshinyasio, ewe olinobunyali bwokhuhabina uli mumulilo
Halali balia baria Nyasaye wabu balinyoola tsigorofa ebikoro biombakhwa hekulu webindi, emialo chiburanga hasi wabio, indache ya Nyasaye ne Nyasaye shanyala okhwima shiayakhulaka tawe

Koo shololangakhwo shinga Nyasaye yeshinjia amaatsi okhurula mwikulu, mana nakabusia mutsindoto mwiloba, mana namesilia emimela chikabukhane obukondo, mana chiume chikalukhane chibe namabuyu, mana achikhole amasakaria , toto mu ako khulimwo nende eshitsulisio khubandu bamachesi

Koo ulia wa Nyasaye yafungula eshilifu shishie khubuisilamu, mana naba mubulafu bururulanga ewa Nyasaye Omulesi ( bakhaba nashilala nende ulia womwoyo omumu?) eshinyasio eshikhongo shili khubemioyo emiumu chaletsulilanga Nyasaye, abo bali mubukori obwa habulafu

Nyasaye yeshia amakhuwa amalayi muno , eshitabu shietsinyaali tsifwanana tsiakalushilwa, tsirenjinjia emibili chia balia abaria Nyasaye wabu Omulesi, mana nitsikololosia emibili chiabu nende emioyo chiabu khukhwitsulila Nyasaye, obo nibo obulunjifu bwa Nyasaye alunjisinjia khubwo owayenya, ne owa Nyasaye alekha abulaho umulunjisia
Koo ulia wo bweni bubwe bulibukanana nende eshinyasio eshibii inyanga yeyindukho (aliba nashilala nende abalayi?) mana ababii baliboolelwa mbu: “ pile kalia kamwakholanga.”
Bakhaya balia abali imbeli wabu mana eshinyasio nishibetsela munjila yabalamanyile tawe
Mana Nyasaye nabakhofia eshinyasio shiobuteshele, ne eshinyasio shieyinyanga yeyindukho neshikhongo muno, bamanyanga khwo
Ne toto khwachelasilia Abandu mu Kurani ino buli imbia yamachelasio kho banyoole okhwitsulila
Ikurani yolwarabu ibulamwo tsingatsio khobanyoole okhuria Nyasaye

Nyasaye achelasia Omundu uli nende Abaami bakholelanga halala basolananga, nende Omundu uli nende Omwami mulala, koo bakhaba nashilala? Oluyali lwoosi nilwa Nyasaye, halali obunji bwabu shibamanyile tawe
Toto ewe olifwa nabo boosi balifwa
Mana toto enywe imbeli wa Nyasaye wenyu Omulesi mulisoolana, inyanga yeyindukho
Kho niwina omwonooni muno okhushila ulia owakatilia Nyasaye , ne nakhaya obwatoto nibumwitsile , koo Jahannamu shinishio eshimenyo shiabakhayi
Ne ulia owarera obwatoto mana nabutinyisia , abo nibo abaria Nyasaye
Balinyoola biabeenya imbeli wa Nyasaye, oko niko omurungo kwabakholi abamalayi
Kho Nyasaye abaleshele amabii kabakhola, ne abarunje omurungo kwabu khulwa amalayi kabakholanga
Koo Nyasaye shali uyela Omundu wuwe tawe? Ne bakhurisinjia khubalia abalali ye tawe, ne owa Nyasaye alekha oyo obulaho omulunjisia
Ne Owa Nyasaye alunjisia shali nende umukosia tawe, Nyasaye shali Owamaani Oweyimongo?(wokhurunga likhobo)

Ne nobareeba mbu niwina waloonga likulu nende eshialo, balaboola mbu : “ni Nyasaye” boola mbu : “koo mulola murie biamulaamanga ebilali Nyasaye, Nyasaye niyenya okhuwumisia aba nyasaye abo banyala okhwihabina, nohomba nabenyenyela tsimbabaasi bo bakhekalila tsimbabaasi tsitsie? Boola mbu: “Nyasaye yambela ne khuye bamwisiche bokhumwisika.”
Boola mbu: “ enywe Abandu banje khole shinga kamunyala esie siesi ekholanga, mulitsa okhumanya.”
Ni wina olinyoola eshinyasio shietsisoni nende ulia uliba mushinyaasio shilaliwa
Toto khwakhwishilia eshitabu khulwa abandu boosi nende khubwatoto, kho ulia ulunjikha nikhulwa omwoyo kukwe, ne ulia ukora ne toto kalikhuye , ne ewe sholi omulindi wabu tawe

Nyasaye abukulanga emioyo ebise biokhufwa khwachio, ne chilafwile ebise biokhukona khwachio, ne atiila chilia echiahandichilwa okhufwa, ne akalusia echindi okhula ebise biachio biachahandichilwa, toto mu ako khulimwo nende ameeko Khubandu baparanga
Nohomba nibo bekhola ababasabila imbeli wa Nyasaye, boola mbu: “ kata bo babula obunyali bwa shiosi shiosi, ne shibulaho shabamanyile
Boola mbu: “ obulesheli bwoosi ni bwa Nyasaye obwami bwomwikulu nende khushialo nobubwe mana ewuwe niwo omulikalusibwa.”
Ne Nyasaye narumbulwa yenyene emioyo chiabalia abalasuubila tawe chisiukha, ne abandi nibarumbulwa abalali ye obalola nibasangala
Boola mbu: “ewe Nyasaye wanje owaloonga likulu nende eshialo Omumanyi wakalalolekhanga tawe nende kalolekhanga , ewe newe uliawukhasia hakari wabasumba bobo khukalia akabakabukhananga

Ne abamabii babetsanga nende bioosi bili mushialo nende khandi ebindi shinga ebo, toto bakhabirusiye okhwinunula , okhurulana nende eshinyasio eshibii shieyinyanga yeyindukho. Ne kabaliloloshela ewa Nyasaye kalia akabalali niberecheshele tawe
Ne bulibaloloshela obubii bwakabakholanga, mana kalibabotokhana kabatseshelelanga

Ne Omundu nanyoola amasila akhusaba efwe, mana nikhumuwa tsimbabaasi tsirula khwifwe, aboola mbu : “toto esie ehelesibwe kano okhurulana nende amachesi kanje” halali ako ni amatemo habula Abandu abanji shibamanyile tawe.”
Toto baboola ako balia bali imbeli wabu mana shikabakhonyakhwo akabakholanga tawe
Mana obubii bwakabakhola nibubanyoola , ne balia abetsimbi mubano kalibanyoola amabii kabakhola, nabo shibalishila tawe
Koo shibamanyile mbu Nyasaye akabanga emikabo mubunji nende khushichelo owayenya, toto mukano khulimwo nende ameeko khubandu basuubila

Boola mbu: “enywe Abasumba banje bakholelaobubiiemioyochiabu, mulawesiakhwo omwoyo khutsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye tawe, toto Nyasaye aleshelanga ebionoono bioosi, toto ye niye Omulesheli muno Omukoosia po.”
Mukalushile Nyasaye wenyu Omulesi mana mwilekhule khuye, eshinyasio nishishili okhubetsela mana mukhaye okhuhonokokha
Ne loonde amalayi muno akamweshilibwa okhurula khu Nyasaye wenyu Omulesi, eshinyasio nishishili okhubapwoka nanyu nimulamanyile tawe
Mana omwoyo kuletsa kwaboola mbu: “ abayie ndiyitsulisia khukambura ewa Nyasaye, ne toto esie ndali mubokhwikoyania”
Nohomba kuboole mbu: “ Nyasaye yanunjisinjia ndakhabeele mubalia bamuria”
Nohomba kuboole ebise bieshinyasio mbu: “ abayie nengalusibwayo nemba mubandu abalayi”
Shikanyalikhana tawe, toto ebimanyiso bianje biakhwitsila mana nobikhaya nofura noba mubakhayi
Ne inyanga yeyindukho olilola balia bakhaya ka Nyasaye wabu obweni bwabu nibumaliye, koo mu Jahannamu shinishio eshimenyo shiabafuru
Ne Nyasaye alihonia balia bamuria, khulwokhubura khwabu, shibalinyoolwa nobubii bwosi bwosi tawe, nohomba shibalibeelela tawe
Nyasye niye waloonga buli eshindu naye niye omulindi wa buli eshindu
Niye uli nende tsifunguo tsielikulu nende eshialo ne balia bakhaya ebimanyisio bia Nyasaye abo nibo balitiba
Boola “owulali Nyasaye niye wamunomesinjia okhulaama enywe Abasilu?”
Ne toto wafimbulilwa nende balia abaliho imbeli wuwo mbu : “notsokaasia Nyasaye ebikhole bibio bioosi bilakwa akhaya, ne toto oliba Mubandu basikha.”
Halali laama butswa Nyasaye mana obe mubalia bakhupanga orio

Ne shibamuwa Nyasaye oluyali shingala kenyekhana tawe, ne eshialo shiosi shiliba mumukhono kukwe, ne likulu lilikanyakanywa liaba mumukhono kukwe omulunji, oluyali ni olulwe Owekulu nomutwenufu khukabamutsokaasinjia ninako
Ne olwika lulikhupwa mana bifwe bioosi ebili mwikulu nende khushialo halali ulia wa Nyasaye alichama, mana khandi lulikhupwa olundi mana boosi balibukha nibahenga
Mana eshialo shiliakha khubulafu bwa Nyasaye washio Omulesi, ne eshitabu shilirerwa, ne Abarumwa balirerwa nende Abaloli, mana barungwe omurungo kwa toto nabo shibalikholelwa obubii tawe
Mana buli shiamundu alirungwa kayakholanga , naye (Nyasaye) yamanya muno kabakholanga

Ne abakhayi baliyilwa mujahannamu mumikanda, okhula shingala balikuulakhwo, mana emiliango chakwo chiikulwe Abalindi bakhwo balireeba mbu: “ koo Abarumwa shibabetselakhwo tawe okhurula mwinywe? Nibabasoomela tsinyaali tsia Nyasaye wenyu Omulesi, nibekanyilisia okhubukanana nende inyanga yenyu ino?” baliboola mbu: “kali kario halali likhuwa lieshinyasio liatinyisibwa khubakhayi.”
Baliboolelwa mbu: “ injile mumuliango chia Jahannamu mumenyemwo tsinyanga tsiosi” ni eshimenyo eshibii shirie khubafuru

Ne abaria Nyasaye wabu Omulesi baliyilwa mwikulu mumikanda, okhula shingala baliulakhwo mana emiliango nichikulwa mana Abalindi bakwo baliboola mbu : “ omuleembe kube ninanyu, muli abalayi, injilemwo mumenyemwo tsinyanga tsiosi.”
Baliboolambu:“oluyalilwoosi nilwa Nyasaye ukhuhelesiye kayakhulaka, akhulesheele eshialo khumenya mumikunda shingala khwenya . Ne ni omurungo omulayi kuli kurie khubakholi (bamalayi)

Ne olilola Abamalaika nibabotokhana eshisala shia Nyasaye Omulesi, nibetsominjia nibafumia oluyali lwa Nyasaye Omulesi wabu mana balirungwa khubwatoto, ne baliboola mbu: ‘’ oluyali lioosi nilwa Nyasaye Omulesi webiloonje bioosi.”
Ha mim
Okhwishibwa khweshitabu shino khurula khu Nyasaye Owamani Omumanyi muno
Uleshelanga tsimbi ufuchililanga eshileshelo, Oweshinyasio eshilulu , umuhaani abulaho Nyasaye halali Ye, ne ewuwe niwo amakalushilo
Shibayingananga khubimanyisio bia Nyasaye tawe halali bialia bakhaya , kho okhuyelayela khwabu khushialo khulakhung’ang’asia tawe

Imbeli wabu Abandu ba Nuh nende emikanda chindi chiakhaya okhuloonda ka Nyasaye, ne buli omukanda kwali nendeamahababakokhutila Omurumwa wabu, mana nibayingana khubukori khobanyoole okhukalukhania obwatoto , mana nebatiila, kho eshinyasio shianje shiali shirie
Ne endi nilwaliatinyisibwa likhuwa lia Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi khubakhayi, mbu toto bo ni Abandu bomumulilo

Ne balia bachinganga indebe(arsh) nende	balia	bamubotokhana bamwitsoominjia nibahelesia Nyasaye wabu oluyali , nebamusuubilanga ne basabilanga eshileshelo balia basuubila: “ Nyasaye wefu Omulesi waswania buli eshindu tsimbabaasi nende obumanyi kho baleshele balia abasaba eshileshelo mana nibaloonda injila yiyio, ne obekalile eshinyasio shio mulilo

Nyasaye wefu Omulesi obenjisie mwikulu mumukunda kulaliwa tawe, kwa wabalaka nende balia bakhola amalayi mubebusi babu, nende abakhasi babu nende olwibulo lwabu , toto ewe newe Owamaani Owamachesi muno
Ne obekalile amabii, ne owawikalila amabii inyanga eyo toto oliba omukoosiyie, ne okho nikho okhubura okhukhongo
Toto balia bakhaya balilangwa mana baboolelwe mbu: “ toto okhusinya khwenyu Nyasaye ni okhukhongo okhushila shinga mwesinya abeene, olwa mwalangungwa khubusuubili nanyu nimukhaya”
Baliboola mbu: “ Nyasaye wefu Omulesi okhufwisiyie khabili, ne okhulamusiyie khabili, mana khufuchilile tsimbi tsiefu, kho injila yokhurula iliho
Ako ni endio , okhubeela Nyasaye niyalaamungwa yenyene mwakhayanga , ne natsokaasibwa mwachamanga, mana obunyali ni bwa Nyasaye omukhongo wehekulu
Ye niye ubalolosilinjia ebimanyisio bibie, ne abeshilinjia okhurula hekulu emikabo. Ne abulaho witsulila kano halali ulia umukalushila
Kho mulaame Nyasaye nomwitswenula khu dini yiyie , kata abakhayi nibasinyikha
Niye unininjia ebichelo, mwene ishisala , arumanga Malaika(jibril ) Ruh khubunyali bubwe khuwayenya mubasumba bebe, khulwa okhubekanyilisia inyanga yomukhung’ano
Inyanga ya baliemela, shibulaho shiosi shiosi shilifisa khu Nyasaye, “Obwami ni bwa wina Inyanga yino? Ni obwa Nyasaye mulala ukholanga kayeenya.”
Nyanga yino buli Omundu alarungwa kayakholanga, luno okhukholanila obubii khubulaho , toto Nyasaye ni Omwangu wokhubala
Ne bekanyilisie inyanga ili ahambi , olwe emioyo chiliula khwiporokotio, nabo nibayinjilwe neshibeela, abamabii shibaliba nende Omwitsa nohomba ubasabila yawulilwa tawe
Yamanya okhukatia khwetsimoni, nende ke emioyo chifisanga
Ne Nyasaye abusinjia khubwatoto , ne balia balaamanga owulali Nyasaye shibabusinjia shiosi shiosi tawe, toto Nyasaye ni Omuwulili Omuloli muno

Shibachendangakhwo khushialo mana balola indukho yabalia bali imbeli wabu, bali nende amani amanji okhubashila, nende ebikhole ebikhongo khushialo, mana Nyasaye nabatila obutinyu khutsimbi tsiabu, mana nibakhaywa ubakhoonya okhurula khushinyasio shia Nyasaye
Endio nilwokhuba mbu Abarumwa babetselanga nende ebifune biyela mana nibakhaya ne Nyasaye nabatila, toto ye niwa amaani weshinyasio eshilulu
Ne toto khwaruma Musa halala nende ebimanyisio biefu nende ebifune bia habulafu
Khu Firaun nende Hamana nende Qarun, mana nibaboola mbu : “uno ni Omulosi Omubeeyi muno.”

Olwa yabeetsela nende obwatoto okhurula khwifwe , baboola mbu: “yire Abana abasiani babalia basuubila ninaye , mana muleshe Abana abakhana, ne ebifwanga bia bakhayi shibli hosi hosi tawe halali mubukori.”
Ne Firaun naboola mbu : “mundeshe ndire Musa mana alanje Nyasaye wuwe Omulesi, esie eritsanga ye okhukalukhania idini yenyu nohomba akhole amabii khushialo.”
Ne Musa naboola mbu: “esie ndilinda khu Nyasaye wanje Omulesi khu enywe, okhurulana nende buli Omufuuru ulasuubilanga inyanga yokhubalilwa”

Mana Omusatsa omusuubili mubandu ba Firaun owafisa obusuubili bubwe naboola mbu: “koo mwira butswa Omundu shichila okhuboolasa mbu Nyasaye nomulesi wanje ne abetseele nende abwatoto okhurula khu Nyasaye wenyu, ne nali mbu nomubeyi mumuleshe nobubeyi bubwe , ne nali owatoto kamulakanga kalamunyoola, toto Nyasaye shalunjisinjia ulia wabura eshichelo Omubeyi tawe.”

Enywe Abandu banje obwami nobwenyu nyagayino mushilile khushialo, ne wina ulikhuhabina khushinyasio	shia	Nyasaye nishilikhwitsila? Firaun naboola mbu: “esie shebaboolela liosi liosi tawe halali lilia liendola , ne esie shebalunjisinjia tawe halali khunjila yobulunjifu.’’
Ne wasuubila ulia naboola mbu: “ enywe Abandu banje esie abariranga shinga tsinyanga tsie mikanda
Shinga Abandu ba Nuh nende ba Ad nende Thamud nende balia ababaloondakhwo, ne Nyasaye shakholelanga	Abandu	bebe akabalakhoyeshele tawe
Enywe Abandu banje esie abaririranga inyanga yetsimbungu
Inyanga yamulilukha nimukalukha inyuma, shimuliba nende wokhubalinda khu Nyasaye tawe, ne ulia wa Nyasaye yahandichila obukori shali nende umulunjisia tawe

Ne toto Yusuf yamala okhubetsela nende obulafu bwatoto, halali enywe nimutsilila okhuba nende tsinganakani khukalia kayamurerera okhuula shinga yafwa, mwaboola mbu Nyasaye shalirera Omurumwa wundi tawe, endio nilwa Nyasaye alekhanga akora ulia owabura eshichelo wikanakaninjia

Balia bayingananga khubimanyisio bia Nyasaye nibabula amatililo , neshisinyisio eshikhongo imbeli wa Nyasaye nende imbeli wabasuubili, endio nilwa Nyasaye aretsanga eshimanyisio khubuli omwoyo omufururu kwisunganga
Mana Firaun naboola mbu: “ Hamana nyumbashile ingasi (munara) kho enyoole okhuulila khutsinjila

Tsinjila tsielikulu enyoole okhulola Nyasaye wa Musa, netoto esie amuparirasa mbu ni omubeyi.” Ne endio ni lwa Firaun yakholelwa alole ebikhole bibie ebibii okhuba ebilayi mana niyekalilwa tsinjila. Ne ebikhole bia Firaun shibiamukhoonya tawe halali okhumusishia
Na owasuubila ulia naboola mbu: “enywe Abandu banje munondekhwo ebalunjisie injila yabalunjifu”
Enywe Abandu banje toto obulamu bwokhushialo khuno ni omwikhoyo omutiti ne toto mwikulu nisho eshimenyo shietsinyanga tsiosi
Ulia ukhola amabii shalirungwa halali amabii, ne ulia ukhola amalayi mubasatsa nohomba mubakhasi nali omusuubili , abo nibo balinjila mwikulu, balihebwa emikabo chibula eshichelo
Enywe Abandu banje muli murie ebalanganga khubuhonia nanyu munaanganga okhutsia mumulilo
Munaanganga mbu ekhaye Nyasaye mana emutsokasie khukengorerwe , nasi emulanganga khu owa Amaani Owobulesheli muno

Toto	owamunanjilanga okhumulaama shakhoyesheele okhukholelwa omulango khushialo khuno nohomba mwikulu tawe, ne efwe fwesi khulikalusibwa ewa Nyasaye , ne toto balia babura eshichelo nibo Abandu bomumulilo
Ne mulitsulila kebaboolelanga kano ne endeshela likhuwa lianje Nyasaye, toto Nyasaye alolanga muno Abasumba bebe
Mana Nyasaye nabaliinda khubusuku bwabakhola, mana eshinyasio eshibii shilibotokhana Abandu ba Firaun
Balinjila mumulilo itsuli nende ingoloobe ne olwa indukho iliula baliboolelwa mbu: “injisie Abandu ba Firauni mushinyasio eshilulu”
Olwa balireebana mumulilo, Abateshele balireeba Abafuru mbu: “ toto efwe khwabaloondangakhwo mana munyala okhukhututuyiliakhwo omulilo kuno.”
Abafuru baliboola mbu: “ toto efwe fwesi khulimwo , toto Nyasaye amalile okhubusia khubandu bebe”
Balia bali mumulilo baliboolela abalindi bomulilo mbu: “ mukhusabilekhwo Nyasaye wenyu Omulesi , akhututuyiliekhwo eshinyasio kata inyanga ndala.”
Baliboola mbu: “Abarumwa shibabeetselanga nende ebifune biahabulafu? Baliboola mbu: “kali kario” mana baliboolelwa mbu: “ musabe Nyasaye wenyu, ne amalaamo kabakhayi ni amakhaya imbeli wa Nyasaye
Toto efwe khulihabina Abarumwa befu nende balia basuubila khushialo, nende inyanga yabaloli balieema
Inyanga yebichila biabakhayi shibiliwulilwa tawe, ne balinyoola eshitsubo, ne balinyoola eshimenyo eshibi muno
Netoto khwahelesia Musa obulunjifu ne nikhuhelesia Abana ba Israil eshitabu
Shilimwo obulunjifu nende emetsulisio khu bandu bamachesi
Kho wisumilisie toto aka Nyasaye yalaka kalirulila, ne saba eshileshelo khumabii ko, ne witsomie Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi ingoloobe nende itsuli

Toto balia bayingananga khubimanyisio bia Nyasaye nibabula amatililo , ebilifu biabu nebikhaya halali benyanga obukhongo ne shibanyala okhubuulila tawe, kho wilinde khu Nyasaye , toto ye ni Omuwulili Omuloli muno
Toto okhulongwa khwelikulu nende eshialo nokhukhongo okhushila okhulongwa khwa Abandu, halali Abandu abanji shibamanyile tawe
Ne shibahelaana omuwofu nende owulolanga tawe, nohomba balia abasuubila nibakhola amalayi bakhayelana nende abetsimbi? Muparanga hatiti muno
Toto indukho iliula ibula obukanakani tawe, halali Abandu abanji shibasuubilanga tawe
Ne Nyasaye wenyu Omulesi yaboola mbu: “musabee ndalabahelesia, toto balia belolanga okhulaama esie balinjila mumulilo nibatutuye.”
Nyasaye niye wabakholela eshilo muhulushilemwo, ne eshitere mulolele, toto Nyasaye niwetsimbabaasi khubandu halali Abandu abanji shibakhupanga orio tawe
Oyo niye Nyasaye wenyu omulesi owaloonga buli eshindu , abulaho Nyasaye wundi owulali ye tawe, kho ni hena amuhenjibungwa
Ne endio nilwa baliinjibwa balia abakhayanga ebimanyisio biefu

Nyasaye niye wabakholela eshialo okhuba eshimenyo , ne likulu okhuba eshiumbashe , mana nabahelesia ifwani indayi muno, ne nabahelesia emikabo emilayi muno , oyo niye Nyasaye Omulesi wenyu , ne niwoluyali Nyasaye Omulesi webilonje biosi
Naye Nomulamu abulaho Nyasaye wundi owulali Ye , khomumulaame mubutwenufu, oluyali nilwa Nyasaye Omulesi webilonje bioosi

Boola mbu: “ toto esie ndakanibwa okhulaama biamulamaanga ebilali Nyasaye , olwa obulafu bwanzitsila okhurula khu Nyasaye wanje Omulesi ne elomesibwe okhwilekhula khu Nyasaye Omulesi webiloonje bioosi

Niye wabaloonga okhurula khwiloba, okhutsia khu amaatsi kolwibulo , okhutsia okhuba lilika lia matsayi, okhula shingala murulamwo abatoro, okhula shingala muula abakali, okhula shingala muba abakofu, ne mwinywe baliho abafwitsanga nibashili abatiti ne boosi boole khubise biabalachilwa, kho munyoole okhupara
Niye ulamusinjia ne niye ufwisiinjia , ne niyenya okhukhola likhuwa aboolanga butswa mbu: “ ba” niliba
Shololanga balia bayingananga khubimanyisio	bia	Nyasaye balinjibungwa hena
Nebalia bakhaya eshitabu nende kalia kakhwaruma Abarumwa befu, balitsa okhumanya
Olwa baliboywa mwikosi mwabu emikoye nende eminyororo, nibakhwesulululwa
Mumaatsi kayia pa (hamiim) mana basambwe mumulilo
Mana baliboolelwa mbu: “bali hena abamwasaanjinjia ninabo
Abalali Nyasaye.” Baliboola mbu: “bakhukorerekhwo halali shikhwalaamanga shiosi shiosi inyuma wefu tawe” Endio nilwa Nyasaye akosinjia Abakhayi
Ako nilwokhuba mbu mwasangalanga khushialo khunjila ilali ya habwene nende shingala mwelolanga
Injile mumiliango chia Jahannamu, mumenyemwo tsinyanga tsioosi, ni eshimenyo eshibi shili shirie khubafuru
Kho wisumilisie toto aka Nyasaye yalaka kaliba, ne nikhukhwechesia khu kalia kakhwabalaka nohomba nikhukhufwisia , ne nikhwifwe butswa niwo abalikalukha

Ne toto khwaruma Abarumwa imbeli wuwo, abandi khwakhuboolela ne abandi bakhulakhuboolela, ne Omurumwa shiyakharerere eshimanyisio shiosi shiosi halali khubunyali bwa Nyasaye, mana lilako lia Nyasaye lwaliliitsa lilibusibwa khubwatoto ne awo Abakori balisikha
Nyasaye niye wabalonjela ebiruche ebindi bibachingenge ne ebindi mulitsenje
Ne munyoola obukhoonyi khubio, ne bibamalilanga obusiro buli mumioyo chienyu, ne muchingungwa khubio nende	biomumatsi muchingungwakhwo
Ne abechesinjia ebimanyisio bibie , kho nibimanyisio shina biamukhayanga

Shibachendangakhwo khushialo mana balola indukho yabalia abali imbeli wabu, bali abaanji , nende amaani amanji nende ebikhole ebikhongo khushialo okhubashila. Ne koosi kabakholanga shikabakhoonya shiosi shiosi tawe
Olwa Abarumwa babu babetsela nende	ebilolelo bia habulafu, basaangalila okhurulana nende obumanyi bwa baali ninabwo, mana nikababotokhana kalia akabakholelanga omubayo
Olwa balola eshinyasio shiefu, baboola mbu : “ khusuubiile Nyasaye mulala yenyene, ne khwikanile biakhwatsokasinjia ninabio. (Nyasaye)
Obusuubili bwabu shibwabakhoonya eshindu tawe olwabalola eshinyasio shiefu. Eyo niyo injila ya Nyasaye yabura khubasumba bebe, mana eyo Abakhayi nibasikha
Ha Mim
Ameshio kano karula khu Omunji, Wetsimbabaasi Wobukoosia muno
Eshitabu shie tsinyali tsiashio tsienoosibwa, shisomungwa mulwarabu khubandu baminyile
Shisuubisia nende okhwikanyilisia, halali abanji bakhaya okhubukulamwo oluchendo, mana shibasuulilanga tawe
Ne baboola mbu: “ emieyo chiefu chiafunikhwa khukokhulanjilanga ako, ne amarwi kefu kekala, ne hakari wefu ninawe khuli nende eshikalilo, ne khola toto fwesi khukholanga.”

Boola esie endisa Omundu shinga enywe, enyolanga obufimbuli mbu toto Nyasaye wenyu ni Nyasaye mulala, kho mulunjishe khuye ne mumusabe eshileshelo, ne eshinyasio eshikhongo shilinyoola abatsokaasinjia Nyasaye
Balia balarusinjia eshihanwa tawe ne bakhaya ukhusuubila inyanga yeyindukho
Toto balia basuubila mana nibakhola amalayi bali nomurungo kulaliwa
Bola mbu: “toto enywe mukhayanga ulia waloonga eshialo khutsinyanga tsibili, ne mumusasia nende abanyasaye bandi, oyo niye Nyasaye webiloonje biosi.”
Ne yaramwo tsingulu hekulu washio, ne naramwo ikhabi, nenabalililamwo emikabo chabio khutsinyanga tsine, kano kali habwene muno khubarebanga
Mana naleng’ana khwikulu nalo nilili omwosi, naliboolela nende eshialo “ itse nimuchamile noho nimukhayile,” biaboola mbu : “ khwitsile nikhuli abarechelefu.”
Mana naloonga “ amakulu saba” khutsinyanga tsibili, mana nahana buli likulu akalio, mana nikhurona likulu lieshialo khu tsitaa tsiobulindi, esho nishio eshichelo shia Nyasaye Owamani Omumanyi muno
Ne nibalakabukulamwo oluchendo tawe, boola mbu: “ Ebekanyisilia eshinyasio sholuyoka shinga shiali sha A’ad nende Thamud

Olwa betselwa nende Abarumwa okhurula imbeli wabu nende inyuma wabu, nibaboolelwa mbu: “ mulalaame shiosi shiosi tawe halali Nyasaye.” nibaboola mbu: “ Nyasaye wefu alenya yakharumile Abamalaika, kho toto efwe khukamwarumwa ninako ako khukhayile.”

Mana Abandu ba A’ad, Bali abafuru khushialo munjila ilali yatoto tawe, mana nibaboola mbu: “ wina ushila efwe amani ? “ shibalolanga mbu Nyasaye wabaloonga ali namaani okhubashila, Ne bakhayanga ebimanyisio biefu

Mana nikhubarumila omuyeka kweyimbumbuyeka,	khutsinyanga tsiamasila, kho banyoole okhupila eshinyasio shiokhubafulafusia, mubulamu bwokhushialo, ni eshinyasio shie indukho ni shokhufulafusia okhukhongo okhushila, Nabo shibalihabinwa tawe
Ne Abandu ba Thamud khwabalunjisia halali nibachama obuwofu okhushila obulunjifu, mana omulilo kweshinyasio shieshifulafusio, nikubabukula khu kalia kabakholanga
Mana nikhuhabina abasuubila abali nibaria Nyasaye mubo
Ne inyanga yabasuku ba Nyasaye balikhung’asibwa mumulilo, nibakabulwa mumikanda chaukhane
Olwa balikulakhwo (omulilo oko), amarwi kabu nende tsimoni tsiabu nende amaseelo kabu bilirusia obuloli khu koosi pe kabakholanga

Ne balireeba amaseelo kemibili chiabu mbu,: “ shina shichila noyinia obuloli khwifwe ?” kaliboola mbu: “ Nyasaye okhulomalomiyie owulomalominjia buli eshindu Naye niye awamulonga olwokhuranga na iwuwe namulikalukha.”
Shimwali nimunyala okhwifisa tawe, kho amarwi kenyu nende tsimoni tsienyu nende amaseelo kenyu akhubarusilia obuloli, halali mwaparanga mbu toto Nyasaye shiyamanya amaanji kamukholanga tawe
Ako niko amaparo kenyu, kamuparire Nyasaye wenyu Omulesi, kamusishiye, mana nimuba mubalia abatiba
Ne nibefwila, omulilo nisho eshimenyo shiabu, ne nibasaba eshileshelo shibaleshelwa tawe

Mana nikhubelesia abetsa, mana nibabaronela ke imbeli nende inyuma wabu, mana likhuwa nilibusibwa khubo , babe halala nende amahanga kabura imbeli wabu, okhurulana nende Amajini nende Abandu, toto abo nibaba bokhusikha
Ne Abakhayi baboola mbu: “ mularechelesia Ikurani ino tawe, ne khupe oluyoka mwakhaba murio mwashila.”
Mana toto khulabakhofia eshinyasio eshilulu balia bakhaya, ne toto khulabarunga omurungo omubii khukabakholanga
Oko niko omurungo kwa basuku ba Nyasaye, Omulilo, Omo shiliba eshimenyo shiabu tsinyanga tsiosi, omurungo kwabu khukalia kabakhayanga ebilolelo biefu
Ne abakhayi baliboola mbu: “Nyasaye wefwe Omulesi khwechesie balia bakhukosinjia mu Majini nende Mubandu, khubakhole babe hasi webilenje bwefu khobabe khu bandu bahasi muno.”
Toto balia baboola mbu : “ Omulesi wefu ni Nyasaye, mana nibalunjikha, Abamalaika balabeeshelanga mana bababoolele mbu: “ mularie tawe nohamba mulabeelela tawe ne sangalile “mwikulu ” ewamwalakungwa
Efwe khuli abahelwa benyu khubulamu bwokhushialo nende mwikulu, ne bilimwo biosi pe bie mioyo chenyu chikombanga, ne omo mulinyoolamwo bioosi biamwenya
Obucheni okhurula khu Nyasaye Amulesheli muno, wobukoosia po
Ne wina oyo wamakhuwa amalayi muno, okhushila ulia ulanganga khu injila ya Nyasaye , mana akhole amalayi, mana aboole mbu endi halala nabasalamu
Obulayi shibuyelana nende obubii tawe, runga obubii nende lilia lilayi, kata bibe shinga ulia woli naye obusuku ni omwitsawo wa mbusia ngonie
Ne shibakhanyoola obulayi buno tawe halali balia bokhwifwila, ne shiyakhanyoola tawe halali ulia weyikhabi ikhongo
Ne shetani nakhubeyia beyia neshibeyibeyi wishinje khu Nyasaye, toto ye niye Omuwulili, Omumanyi muno
Ne mubimanyisio bibie ni eshilo nende eshitere nende eliuba nende omwesi, mulenamila eliuba nohomba omwesi tawe, ne inamile Nyasaye wabiloonga toto nimumulaamanga yenyene
Ne nibafura, manya mbu bioosi ebili ewa Nyasaye bimwitsoominjia eshilo neshitere, nabio shibichong’anga tawe

Ne mubimanyisio bibie , toto ewe ololanga liloba ( liniongofu) liabuyukha ne nikhulirakhwo amatsi olola nilirenga imirombo nichirulamwo, toto ulia uwalilamusia niye ulilamusia abafu, toto ye ni Omunyali wa buli eshindu

Toto balia bakoyasinjia obwatoto buli mubimanyisio biefu shibakhakhwifisila tawe, kho ulia ufubwa mumililo ali obulayi okhushila ulwa witsa nomulembe inyanga yeyindukho? khole shamwenya toto ye alolanga muno kamukholanga
Toto balia bakhaya ametsulisio olwa kabetsela, ( balisishibwa) ne toto neshitabu shiamani shioluyali
Obukori shibwakhashitsila okhurula inyuma washio noho imbeli tawe, sheshibwa nende Omuchesi witsomibungwa muno
Koboolelungwa kano ni kalia kaboolelwa Abarumwa betsa imbeli wuwo. Ne toto Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi ni umelesheli ne ni mwene eshinyasio eshilulu

Ne khukholanga Ikurani ino mulusungo olucheni bakhaboolele mbu : “shichila shina tsinyali tsiayo nitsilaba tsinzaukhania ? lwakhaba lurie olusungo olucheni naye Omurumwa nomwarabu ?” Boola: Ikurani ino ni obulunjifu nende eshinyisio khu usuubila. Ne balia balasuubila mumarwi kabu baramwo tsimbale, nabo khuyo nabawofu, abo balangungwa nabo bali ehale
Netoto khwarumila Musa eshitabu, mana nibaukhanamwo, ne lilabetsanga likhuwa liaranjilila okhurula khu Nyasaye wo Omulesi, bakhabusilibwe, ne toto abo bali mushibeyibeyi shiobuyendi
Owukhola amalayi akholela omwoyo kukwe, ne ukhola amabii kali khumwoyo kukwe ne Nyasaye wuwo shakholelanga Omundu amabii tawe

Obumanyi bwokhumanya inyanga yeyindukho bukalusibwa butswa khuye (Nyasaye) ne ebiamo shibirulanga mubimuli biabio, nahomba omukhasi shiyakhabelekha inda nohomba yebule halali Nyasaye yamanya. Ne inyanga yabalilanga mana abareebe mbu: “ bali hena abamwasanjinjia ninabo?” baliboola mbu: “ khufuchilila mbu abulaho yesiyesi mwifwe uyinia obuloli khukano”
Mana nibabakorakhwo balia ababalamanga ne nibaba nende obwatoto mbu babula abelushila
Omundu shachonga’nga okhusaba amasayo amalayi tawe, ne amabii nikamunyoola afwa omwoyo

Ne nikhumukhofwa tsimbabaasi tsiefu niyakhamala okhunyakhanakhwo, toto alaboola mbu: “ kano niko kekhoyeshele, ne shembara indukho nilibaho tawe, ne nengalusibwa khu Nyasaye wanje Omulesi, toto esie endi nende obulayi ewuwe,” khuliboolela abakhayi kabakholanga, ne toto khuli bahelesia eshinyasio eshisiro
Ne nikhuhelesia Omundu obwokholo, akalukhana nakhupila Abandu likosi, ne amabii nikamunyoola asaba amasayo amarambi
Boola mbu: “ mulola murie nikali kano mbu karula khu Nyasaye, mana mukakhaye, ni wina omukori muno okhushila ulia wamainji kali ehale.?”
Khulabechesia ebimanyisio biefu hekulu , nende mumioyo chiabu, okhula kamanyikhane khubo mbu kano nikatoto” , koo shikakhuyela tawe mbu Nyasaye wuwo nomuloli wabuli eshindu
Manye mbu toto abo bali mutsinganakani khukhubukanana nende Nyasaye wabu, Manye mbu toto Nyasaye yatererera buli eshindu
Ha mim
Ayn Sin Qaf
Endi nilwa akhufimbulila obufimbuli ewe nende abaliho imbeli wuwo, Nyasaye Owamaani Owamachesi muno
Nebibie bili mwikulu nende mushialo, naye niye Owoluyali Omukhongo

Likulu likhaaba okhwatikhana mwo hekulu eyo, ne Abamalaika betsoominjia Nyasaye wabu Omulesi nibamuwa oluyali, ne basabilanga bali khushialo eshileshelo, Manya mbu Nyasaye niye Omulesheli Owobukoosa muno
Ne balia abakhola abalindi bandi abalali Ye tawe, Nyasaye niye Omulindi wabu, ne ewe sholi omuhabini wabu tawe

Ne endio nilwakhwakhufimbulila Ikurani mulusungo lwo lwarabu, kho wikanyilisie Abandu ba nyina tsingongo (Makka,) nende abali mutsimbeka tsiayio, ne okanyilisie inyanga yokhukhung’asibwa Abandu boosi ibula obukanakani tawe, Omukanda kundi kuliba mwikulu ne ukundi kuliba mumulilo
Ne Nyasaye yenyanga yakhabakholele boosi omukanda mulala, halali yenjisinjia owayenya mutsimbabaasi tsitsie, ne ababii shibaliba nende omuliindi nohomba omukhonyi tawe
Nohomba babukula abaalindi bandi abalali Nyasaye, Ne Nyasaye niye omulindi naye niye ulamusinjia abafuu, naye niye Omunyali wabuli eshindu
Ne shiosi shosi shiamwawukhanamwo, obukhalachi bashio buli khu Nyasaye, oyo niye Nyasaye Omulesi wanje, niye wandisikanga ne ni ewuwe ni andilikalukha
Omulonji welikulku nende eshialo, niye owabaloonga omukhasi no musatsa, nende tsisolo tsiosi tsirio, abametelelangakhwo ario, shibulaho shoisi shiosi shifwanana naye, naye ni Omuwulili Omuloli muno
Niye mwene tsifunguo tsielikulu nende eshialo, ahelesinjia owayenyele omukabo omunji ne alonga owayenya, toto ye ni Omumanyi wabuli eshindu

Nyasaye yabalachila mudini ka yalachila Nuh nende kakhwakhufimbulila ewe, nende kakhwalachila Ibrahim nende Musa nende Yesu, mbu mutile idini ne mulakabukhana khuyo tawe, ni amasiro khubatsokaasi kobalanjilanga ako, Nyasaye alobolaanga ewuwe wayenya, na alunjisinjia ulunjikha khuye

Ne shibakabukhana halali nibakhanyoola obumanyi khulwe shikhalikhali shiali hakari wabu, ne likhayanga okhuba likhuwa liaranjilila okhurula khu Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi- liokhusitia okhuula khundukho- bakhakhalachilwe, ne toto balia banyoola eshitabu khubalia baliho imbeli wabu bashikanakanilanga nibakoyana

Ne khwako, balanje, ne lunjikha shinga walomesibwa, ne alaloonda okhwenya khwabu tawe, ne boola mbu : “esuubile ka Nyasaye yeshia mubitabo, ne elomesibwe okhukhola abuleng’afu hakari wenyu, ne Nyasaye niye Omulesi wefu nende Omulesi wenyu, khuli nende ebikhole biefu, nanyu muli nende ebikhole bienyu, liakhuyinganilakhwo libulaho hakari wefu, ne Nyasaye alikhukhung’asia fwesi halala, ne ewuwe nakhulikalukha.”
Ne balia bayingananga khu Nyasaye nibamalile okhufuchililwa, okhuyingana khwabu nokhukhaya imbeli wa Nyasaye wabu Omulesi, ne basinyishilwa ne bali nende eshinyasio eshilulu
Nyasaye niye weshia eshitabu khubwatoto nende eshichelo, ne ni shina shiokhumanyia mbu indukho ili ahambi
Abalasuubila bayungubasinjia benya mbu yitse lwangu, ne abasuubili bayiria ne bamanya mbu toto niyahabwene, koo manya mbu, balia bayingana inyanga ye indukho eyo, bali mubukori abwa ehale muno
Nyasaye nomwihotselefu khubasumba bebe, akabanga omukabo owayenya, naye niye Owamani Owoluyali muno
Yesi yesi wenya lichesa lwomwikulu khulamumetela khwo, ne ulia wenya lichesa liokhushialo khulamuhelesia, ne abula shiosi shiosi mwikulu

Nohomba bo bali nende abanyasaye babatsokaasinjia, babakaasilia amalako keyidini ya Nyasaye alabafuchilila tawe, ne likhayanga okhuba likhuwa liokhwaukhasia bakhakhalachilwe, ne toto ababii bali nende eshinyasio eshilulu

Olilola aboononi nibali abari khukabakhola, nako kaliboolela butswa, nebalia basuubila mana nibakhola amalayi baliba mumikunda chio mwikulu, baliba nende shiabenya shiosi shiosi imbeli wa Nyasaye wabu Omulesi, okho nikhwo okhubura okhukhongo

Ako niko ka Nyasaye asuubisia Abasumba bebe basuubila mana nibakhola amalayi, Boola mbu: “esie shebarebanga omurungo kwosikwosi tawe halali obuheli khubeekho, ne ukhola lilayi khumumetela lilayi,” toto Nyasaye nomulesheli wokhukalusia orio ikhongo muno

Nohomba baboolanga mbu: “ akatilinjia Nyasaye kabulaho,” Ne Nyasaye niyenya nara eshimanyisio khumwoyo kwo, na Nyasaye yosia obukori ne atinyisia abwatoto khumakhuwa keke, toto ye ni Omumanyi muno khukali mubilifu
Naye niye (uchamilanga/ufuchililanga) weshilesholoshia Abasumbabe, nealeshelanga tsimbi ne yamanya muno akamukholanga
Ne niye afuchililanga balia basuubila mana nibakhola amalayi, ne abametalanga tsimbabaasi tsitsie, ne abakhayi bali neshinyasio eshilulu
Ne Nyasaye ahelesinjia Abasumba bebe omukabo omunji bakhafurire khushialo, halali yeshinjia khushichelo shiayenya, Toto ye yamanya obulayi Abasumba bebe ne abalolanga
Naye niye (ureranga/ owishinjia) ifula, Abandu nibawesiyekhwo omwoyo, ne aswaninjia tsimbabaasi tsitsie naye niye omulindi witsomibungwa muno
Ne mubimanyisio bibie okhulongwa khwelikulu nende eshialo, nende bayaswaniamwo bilala khubio tsisolo, naye alinobunyali bwokhukhung’asia niyenya
Ne amasila kosikosi kamunyoola karulana nende kemikhono chienyu chikholele, ne aleshelanga amanji
Ne enywe shimwakhashila khushialo tawe, ne mubula umulindi nohomba ubakhonya ulali Nyasaye tawe
Ne mubimanyisio bibie ni ebiilukhanga khumatsi nibitsia nibikalukha shinga tsingulu
Niyenya ayenzesia omuyeka, ni bitong’a halala nibiemele khunyanza, toto muako khulimwo nende ebimanyisio khubuli wisumilisia omukhupi muno wa orio
Nohomba abitibie mumatsi, khukabakhola ne aleshelanga amanji
Nekho bamanye balia bayingana khubimanyisio biefu mbu babula habundu abelushila
Ne biosi biamwahebwa ni omwikhoyo kwobulamu bwokhushialo, ne bili ewa Nyasaye nebilayi bilaliwa tawe, khubalia basuubila mana nibesika Nyasaye wabu Omulesi yenyene
Ne balia beyikalilanga abionono ebikhongo, nende eshifwolo, nenibasinyisibwa baleshelanga
Nebalia bafuchililanga Nyasaye wabu Omulesi mana balaamanga khatsotso, ne amakhuwa kabu basanjilananga, ne khubia khubakabalile barusinjia
Nende balia olwabakholelwa obusuku, behabinanga
Ne omurungo kwa amabii, ni amabii shinga ako. Kho ulia uleshela, mana yakasia omulembe omurungo kukwe kuli khu Nyasaye, toto ye shiyayanza abetsimbi tawe
Ne balia behabinanga nibakholelwe amabii, babula injila yokhufunaanibwa
Bafunaanibungwa nibalia bakholelanga Abandu amabii, ne bafuranga khushialo munjila ilali yatoto tawe, abo balinyoola eshinyasio eshilulu
Ne ulia wifwila mana yaleshela, toto ako niko amakhuwa kenyekha
Ne wa Nyasaye alekha yakora, abula omulindi ulali ye, ne olilola abamabii olwa balilola eshinyasio, baliboola mbu: “ilikhowo injila yosiyosi yakhunyala okhukalusibwakhwo?”

Olibalola nibayilwa mumulilo, nibewotselesiye mubuteshele, bahenganga mefisi, ne Abasuubila baliboola mbu: “ Toto balia abasikha nibasishia emioyo chiabu nende Abandu babu inyanga yeyindukho” koo manya mbu toto balia betsimbi baliba khushinyasio shilaliwa tawe
Ne shibaliba nende abalindi babahabina tawe halali Nyasaye, ne owa Nyasaye alekha akore, oyo abula injila yosiyosi
Fuchilile Nyasaye wenyu omulesi, Inyanga ileyikalila nishili okhuboolela irulanga khu Nyasaye, shimuliba nende amwilushila tawe, ne shimuliba nende ashibekalila tawe

Ne nibakhaya efwe shikhwakhuruma obe omulindi wabu tawe. Shi Kali khu iwe halali okhusia butswa oburume, ne toto efwe nikhukhofwa omundu tsimbabaasi okhurula khwifwe atsisangalila. ne obubii nibumunyoola khu kakholele omwene, toto Omundu oyo akhayanga muno
Obwami bwemwikulu nende khushialo ni bwa Nyasaye, olonganga shinga yenya, ne ahelesinjia owayenya Abana abakhana, ne ahelesia owayenya abasiani
Nohomba amusaasilie abasiani nabakhana, na akhola owayenya okhuba omukumba toto ye Nomumanyi Omunyali muno
Ne Omundu shiyakhalomaloma nende Nyasaye tawe halali khubufimbuli, nohomba inyuma weshiikalilo, nohomba arume Omurumwa ne amufimbulila khubunyali bwe shiayenya, toto ye niwa hekulu Owamachesi muno

Ne endio nilwakhwakhufimbulila ikurani, khubunyali bwefu, shiwali niwamanya ni shina eshitabu nohomba obusuubili, halali nikhushikhola obulafu, khulunjisia khusio (owakhwenya/ owakhuchamile) mubasumba befu, ne toto ewe ulunjisinjia khunjila ingololofu
Injila ya Nyasaye wabiosi bio mwikulu nende biokhushialo nebibie, koo manye mbu amakhuwa koosi kalikalukha khuNyasaye
Ha Mim
Nditsuba khushitabu shinoosinjia
Toto efwe khwakhola Ikurani mulwarabu kho munyoole okhumanya
Ne toto eyo ili nende amaandiko karula khwifwe, niyoluyali eyamachesi
Koo khuleshe okhubetsulisia mana khwibilile, mbu shichila muli Abandu babura eshichelo
Ne ni Abarumwa benga bakhwaranjilila okhuruma khubandu bakhale
Ne abulaho Omurumwa yesiyesi wabetselanga okhuula bamukholelanga omubayo
Ne khwasishia balia abali nende amaani okhushila bo. Ne okhuchelaasia khwa Abandu ba khale khwamala okhubura
Ne nobareba mbu: “ niwina waloonga likulu nende eshialo?” Toto balaboola mbu: “wabiloonga Owamaani Omumanyi muno”
Ulia wabakwalasilia liloba shinga obulili, nabarereramwo tsinjila khomunyoole okhulunjikha
Niye wishinjia amaatsi okhurula mwikulu khushichelo, nikhulamusilia liloba liafwa, ne endio nilwa mulirusibwamwo
Ne niye owaloonga buli eshindu eshisatsa nende eshikhasi, mana nabakasilia ebininwamwo biomumaatsi, nende tsisolo tsiamuninangakhwo

Kho mwikhale obulayi khu mikongo chiatsio, mana mwitsulile tsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye wenyu, nimwakhamala okhwikhalakhwo	obulayi,	mana muboole mbu: “uluyaali nilwa ulia owakhukwalasilia bino mbu khwikhonyele, ne shikhwakhakholele abeene kano tawe .”
Ne toto khulikalukha ewa Nyasaye wefu Omulesi
Ne bamukholelenga mubasumba bebe omukabo, toto Omundu nomukhayi owahabulafu Owetsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye
Nohomba yebukulila Abana abakhaana mubiloonje bibie biayaloonga, mana nabawulila enywe Abana abasiani
Ne yesi yesi mubo naboolelwa khukabachelasinjiakhwo Nyasaye , obweni bubwe bumaliyanga ne yetsulamwo oburuma
Koo ulia wakhusibwa muburone, ne shanyala okhuboola niyenoosia tawe
Ne bakhola Abamalaika abaali abasumba ba Nyasaye okhuba abakhasi! Koo balolakhwo okhulongwa khwabu? obuloli bwabu bulihandikwa ne balireebwa
Ne baboolanga mbu: “ Nyasaye yenyanga efwe shikhwakhabalaamile tawe.” Shibamanyile ako tawe. Babula liababoola halali obubeyi butswa
Khwabahelesiakhwo eshitabu imbeli wa shino? Mana batilananga ninashio bashiloondanga
Halali baboola mbu: “toto efwe khwanyoola bapapa befu nibaloondanga idini yabu yabalobola kho efwe khuloondanga mubilenje biabu.”

Ne endio shikhwarumakhwo embeli wuwo omwikanyilisi mulukongo lwosi lwosi halali balia bali mubwokholo baboola mbu: “efwe khwanyoola bapapa befu nibaloondanga idini yabu yabalobola nafu khuloondanga mubilenje biabu”
Naboola mbu: “kata nebarerera kobulunjifuobulayiokhushilabiamwanyoola basenywe Nibali ninabwo?” nibaboola mbu: “efwetoto khukhayilesa akamwarumwa ninako ako.”
Mana nikhubatila khumabii kabakhola, kho hengakhwo, indukho yabakhayi shingala yali
Ne olwa Ibrahim baboolela Samwana nende Abandu bebe mbu; “ toto esie endi ehale nenda kamulaamanga ako.”
Halali ulia owalonga niye ulalunjisia
Ne nekhola lino okhuba likhuwa liatong’a khwulwibulo lulwe, bakhababario banyoola okhukalukha
Halali khwasangasia bano nende abebusi babu okhula shiga obwatoto bwaboolela nende Omurumwa Omwinoosi
Ne olwa obwatoto bwaboolela baboola mbu: “ buno ni obulosi ne efwe toto khubukhayile”
Ne nibaboola mbu: “shichila shina Ikurani ino nileshela khumundu omukhongo mumatokho amakhongo kabili kano?”

Nohomba abo nibo bakabanga tsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi? Efwe khwabakabila obulamu bwabu bwokhushialo hakari wabu, ne nikhuninia abaandi okhushila abaandi khubichelo, kho abaandi banyoole okhukholela abaandi emilimo, ne tsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye wuwo tsishila bioosi biabakhung’asinjia
Ne Abandu bakhaya okhuba omukanda mulala, khwakhakholele balia abakhaya Nyasaye tsinzu tsiabu okhuba nende eshitsafu sheifedha, nende tsingasi tsiabu tsiosi tsiabaninilanga
Nende emiliango chietsinzu tsiabu nende ebitanda biabayiekhangakhwo
Nende oburone. Halali ako shinishiosi shiosi tawe, halali ni omwikhoyo kwobulamu bwomushialo muno butswa, ne mwikulu ili ewa Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi niyabalia abaria Nyasaye
Ne ulia wikhola omuwofu khumakhuwa ka Nyasaye, khulamukholela Shetani abe omwitsa wuwe
Ne totobo babekalilanga injila, ne abeene baparanga mbu balunjika
Okhula shinga balikhwitsila baliboola mbu: “ oh manyanga oba ehale ninasi shinga ebukwe nende mumbo, oli omwitsa omubii muno.”
Ne khulwokhuba mbu mwakhola obubii, shibulaho shilabakhoonya enywe olwalelo mbu musanganga mwesi mushinyasio
Koo onyala okhukhola abekala amarwi bawulila, nohomba onyala okhulunjisia abawofu bali mubukori bwahabulafu
Ne kata nikhukhuhiniaho, efwe khwitsa okhubahelesia likhobo liefu khubo
Nohomba	khulakhwechesia akakhwabalaka, nafu toto khuli nende obunyali khubo
Mana tilana nende akawafimbulilwa , toto ewe oli khunjila ingololofu
Netoto kano ni ametsulisio khwiwe nende khubandu bao, ne mulitsa okhurebwa
Ne reba Abakhwaruma imbeli wuwo mubarumwa befu, koo khwakhola abanyasaye bandi balamwe balali Owetsimbabaasi ? (Nyasaye)
Ne toto khwaruma Musa nende ebimanyisio biefu khu Firaun nende aboluyali baye, mana naboola mbu: “ esie endi Omurumwa wa Nyasaye Omulesi webilonje biosi” israeil
Olwa yabetsela nende ebimanyisio biefu bachaka okhumutseshela
Ne shikhwabechesia eshimanyisio shiosi shiosi halali eshikhongo muno okhushila eshindi, mana nikhubatila khushinyasio kho banyoole okhukalukha
Nibaboola mbu: “enywe Abalosi, khusabile Nyasaye indache yayakhulaka,(nakhurusiliaho eshunyasio shino luno) efwe toto khulalunjikha.”
Olwa khwabarusiliaho eshinyasio esho, habwene nahabwene nifunaka indache
Firaun nalaanga Abandu bebe nababoolela mbu: “enywe Abandu banje shendi Omwami welitokho lia Misri, ne emialo chino chiburanga hasi wanje, koo shimulolngakhwo tawe?”
Nohomba esie shendi noluyali okhushila omutakha uno, ulanyala okhurusia amakhuwa obulayi tawe
Ne shichila shina nakhaya okhufwala ebindu bieyidhahabu, nohomba yetse nende Amalaika halala ninaye bokhumukhoonya
Mana nabayila Abandu bebe mana nibamufuchilila, toto abo bali Abandu abakori
Olwa bakhusinyisia khwabatila obutinyu mana nikhubasishia mumaatsi boosi
Ne nikhubakhola okhuba abaranjilili nende eshilolelo khubandu beyinyuma
Ne olwa Omwana wa Mariam yachelasibwa (nende Adam) Abandu bo boopa oluyoka
Mana nibaboola mbu: “ Abanyasaye befu shini abalayi okhushila ye tawe? Ne shibakhuchelasilia bario tawe halali amayinji butswa, ne abo ni Abandu bokhusolana
Naye shali nobunyali tawe halali ni Omusumba wakhwahelesia tsimbabaasi mana nikhumukhola eshilolelo khubana ba
Ne khwenyanga khwakharerere Abamalaika khushialo nibaloondana
Ne toto ye (yesu) ni eshimanyisio shieyinyanga yeyindukho. mulakanakana tawe, ne munoonde khwo, ino niyo injila ingolofu
Ne Shetani alabekalila tawe, toto ye ni Omusuku wenyu owa habulafu
Ne olwa Yesu yetsa nende ebifune biahabulafu, yaboola mbu: “ abeetsele nende amachesi nende okhubenoosilia kalia akamukabukhanangamwo, kho murie Nyasaye mana muwulile.”
Toto Nyasaye niye Omulesi wanje nende Omulesi wenyu, kho mumulaame sa yenyene ino niyo injila ingololofu
Mana emikanda nichikabukhana abeene khubeene, abaane khubalia bakhola amabii khushinyasio shieyinyanga indulu
Koo shina shiabaliindanga, halali indukho iliitsa mubwifisi nabo nibalamanyile tawe
Abeetsa inyanga eyo baliba Abasuku, abeene khubeene, halali balia abaria Nyasaye
Enywe Abasumba banje, shimulaba noburi inyanga yino tawe , neshimulabeelela tawe
Balia Abasuubila ebimanyisio biefu mana nibelekhuula khu Nyasaye. (nibaba abasalamu)
Injile mwikulu enywe nende abakhaye benyu musangasibwemwo
Balibotokhanilibwa ebisanda nende ebikaye bie idhahabu, ne bilibamwo bia omwoyo kwikomba nende ebisangasia tsimoni, ne enywe mulimenyamwo tsinyaanga tsioosi
Eyo niyo mwikulu (janna) amulihebwa khukamwakholanga
Mulibaamwo nende ebiamo ebinji biamulilia
Toto abetsimbi baliba mushinyasio shia Jahannam tsinyanga tsioosi
Shibalihulusibwa khushinyasio esho tawe, ne omo baliwesiakhwo omwoyo. (okhurulamwo)
Ne shikhwabakholela amabii tawe halali boo abeene nibo bali abamabii
Ne balikhupa oluyoka nibalanga: “ewe Malik! Boolela Nyasaye wuwo akhufwisie’’ naye alibaboolela mbu: “enywe toto omo butswa nimwamulamenya.”
Toto khwabetsela nende obwatoto halali obunji bwenyu mwali mwakhaya obwatoto
Nohomba babusia amalako kabu, ne toto nefwe babusinjia
Nohomba baparanga mbu efwe shikhuwulilanga akobwifisi nende kokhumonyana kabu tawe? Eeh tawe, abarumwa befu bali ninabo bahandikanga kabakholanga
Boola mbu: “ Nyasaye abetsanga nende Omwana nesie wakhabeele weyimbeli okhumulaama.”
Ni woluyali Nyasaye Omulesi welikulu nende eshialo, Nyasaye Omulesi weshisaala, khu koosi kabamureetsangakhwo
Ne baleshe bokoyaane nibabaya okhula shinga balinyoolana nende inyanga yabalakwa
Naye niye Nyasaye uli mwikulu nende Nyasaye uli mushialo naye niye Omuchesi Omumanyi muno
Ni woluyali ulia owuli nobwami bwomwikulu nende mushialo nende biosi bilimwo, ne niye uli nobumanyi bwebise bieyindukho ne ewuwe ni amulikalusibwa
Ne abamulaamanga abalali ye babula obunyali bwokhubasabila Omundu eshileshelo. Halali ulia wobuloli bwatoto nabo bamanya
Nenobareeba mbu niwina wabaloongabo, ? toto bweene balaboola mbu ni: “ Nyasaye” kho ni hena abakalukhanibungwa
Ne okhuboola khukhwe (Omurumwa) mbu : “Nyasaye wanje Omulesi bano ni Abandu balasuubila tawe.”
Baleshele ne obaboolele amakhuwa komuleembe. Baliitsa okhumanya
Ha Mim
Nditsuba khushitabu shinoosinjia
Toto	efwe	khwashishia	mushilo shietsikhabi, toto efwe khuli abekanyilisi
Toto ishilo esho buli likhuwa eliamachesi linoosibungwa
Likhuwa lirula khwifwe toto efwe nefwe Abaruma
Tsimbabaasi okhurula khu Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi, toto ye ni Omuwulili Omumanyi muno
Nyasaye Omulesi welikulu nende eshialo nende biosi bili hakari wabio, toto nimuli mbu enywe muli nende obwatieli
Abulaho Nyasaye wundi tawe halali Ye, alamusinjia ne afwisinjia Nyasaye wenyu Omulesi nende Owabasenywe beyimbeli
Halali bo bali mutsinganakani babayanga
Kho linda inyanga yelikulu liakharusie omwosi kulolekha
Kulifunikha Abandu, shino ni eshinyasio eshilulu
Nyasaye Omulesi wefu, khuyiniliekhwo eshinyasio toto efwe nibasuubila
Okhwitsulila khwabu khubakhoonya shina bulano, ne toto Omurumwa Omwinoosia yamala okhubeetsela
Mana nibamukalukhanilia obweni, nibaboola mbu: “ uno yechesibwa, naye ni Omulalu.”
Toto efwe khwitsa okhuyiniaho eshinyasio hatiti, netoto enywe mulakalukha shinga mwali
Inyanga yakhulikhupa eshikhupo eshikhongo toto efwe khulibarunga
Netoto efwe khwakholela Abandu ba Firaun amatemo imbeli wabu, neyaboolela Omurumwa Woluyali
Naboola mbu: “Mumbe Abasumba ba Nyasaye, toto esie endi Omurumwa Omwisikwa khwinywe”
Ne mulakholela Nyasaye obufuru tawe, toto esie ndalabarerera ebifune biyela
Ne esie ndiliinda khu Nyasaye wanje Omulesi ninanyu mulandasa amachina tawe
Ne nimulasuubila tawe , mube ehale ninasi
Nasaba Nyasaye wuwe Omulesi mbu: “toto bano ni Abandu abamabii.”
Mana Nyasaye naboola mbu: “orule nende Abasumba banje eshilo, toto enywe mulalondwakhwo.”
Ne oleshe inyanza endio ngayilekhaane, Toto abo ni omukanda kweliyie kwitsa okhusishibwa
Ne balekha emikunda chinga nende tsisebele
Nende emimela nende obwami bwoluyali
Nende obwokholo bwabasangalilanga
Endio nilwakali, mana nikhuhelesia ako Abandu bandi
Ne likulu nohomba eshialo sishiabalilila tawe, ne shibahebwa ebise tawe
Ne toto khwahabina Abana ba Israeil khushinyasio shiokhubatutuyia
Okhurula khu Firauni, toto ye yali Omufuru mubalia babura eshichelo
Ne toto khwabalobola khumachesi kefu, okhushila ebilonje bindi khushialo
Ne nikhubahelesia ebimanyisio biefu amatemo kalolekha
Toto bano baboolanga mbu
Khubulaho okhufwa khundi tawe halali okhufwa khweimbeli, ne efwe shikhulilamusibwa tawe
Mana lamusiekhwo Basefwe nikali mbu muboolanga habwene
Koo abo ni abalayi muno nohomba Abandu ba Tuba’ nende balia baliho imbeli wabu, khwabasishia toto abo bali abamabii
Ne efwe shikhwaloonga likulu nende bioosi bilimwo khumubayo tawe
Shikhwabiloonga tawe halali khubwatoto, ne abaanji mubo shibamanyile tawe
Toto inyanga yokhubusia ni ebise biarebwaho khuboosi
Inyanga yomwitsa alalikhoonya owashie nende shiosi shiosi tawe, ne shibalihabinwa tawe
Halali ulia owa Nyasaye alikoosia toto ye niwa Amaani Owobukoosia muno
Toto omusaala kwa zaqoom
Ni eshiakhulia shia owetsimbi
Shinga olubia lusaalulwe, lurabachila munda
Shinga okhurabachila khwa amatsi kayile
Baliboolelwa mbu : “mumutile mumusukune hakari wo mulilo kwa jahannam.”
Mana muyombole khumurwe kukwe eshinyasio shia amaatsi karabachila
“Pila.. mbu newe (welolanga) Omwami woluyali
Toto kano niko kamwakanakananga khwo
Toto abaria Nyasaye baliba habundu womulembe
Mwikulu mumikunda nende tsisebele
Balifwala tsingubo tsinderere tsinyangu tsia hariri..nende tsisiro .. nibahengana
Endio nilwo lwakaliba, ne khulibabashila mahurul ain. (abakhana bomwikulu)
Bali laangamwo ebiamo bietsimbia tsioosi, ne balikhala nomulembe
Omo shibalipilamwo lifwa tawe, halali okhufwa khwokhuranga. Ne Nyasaye alibalinda okhurulana nende eshinyasio shia Jahanam
Tsino nitsimbabaasi okhurula khu Nyasaye wuwo omulesi, okho nikho okhubura okhukhongo
Ne efwe khwakhola Ikurani khululimi lulwo, okhuba inyangu khwiwe, kho banyoole okhwitsulila
Liinda nabo boosi baliinde butswa
Ha Mim
Okhwishibwa khweshitabu shino khurula khu Nyasaye Owaamani Owamachesi muno
Toto khulikulu nende khushialo ebimanyisio bilikhwo khubalia basuubila
Nende mukhuloongwa khwenyu nende tsisolo tsiayaswaania ebimanyisio bilimwo khubandu basuubilanga

Ne okhubusania khweshilo nende eshitere nende omukabo kwa Nyasaye yeshinjia okhurula hekulu, mana nalamusia eshialo okhurula mulifwa liashio, nende okhubotokhana khwomuyeka, ebimanyisio bilimwo khubandu bali nende amachesi
Tsino ni tsinyaali tsia Nyasaye khukhusomelanga khubwatoto,	ne makhuwa shina kabanyala okhusuubila nikalali ka Nyasaye nende ebimanyisio bibie
Eshinyasio eshikhongo shilinyoola buli ulia Omubeyi Omwonooni
Awulilanga tsinyaali tsia Nyasaye nitsisomwa khuye, niyekhulumamia khukalia kayakaywa niyelola opara mbu shi atsiwulilekhwo tawe, kho musuubisie eshinyasio eshilulu
Ne namanya eshindu shiosi shiosi mutsinyaali tsiefu ne akhonga omubayo, Abandu abo nibo baliba nende eshinyasio shiokhututuyibwa
Inyuma wabu ni Jahannam, kabakhola shikalibakhoonya shiosi shiosi tawe, nohomba balia babakhola okhuba Nyasaye, ne baliba neshinyasio eshikhongo
Buno ni obulunjifu, ne balia bakhaya ebimanyisio bia Nyasaye wabu Omulesi balinyoola eshinyasio eshilulu shioburuma
Nyasaye niye wakhola inyanza ibarumushile kho ebininwa bichendemwo khubunyali bubwe, ne mukhaabemwo omukabo kukwe, kho munyoole okhumwitsoomia. (okhupa orio)
Niye wakhola bibarumushile ebili mwikulu nende mushialo bioosi okhurula khuye, toto mu ako khulimwo nende ebimanyisio khubandu baparanga
Boolela abasuubila mbu baleshele balia abalasuubilanga tsinyanga tsia Nyasaye, kho anyoole okhubarunga Abandu khukabakholanga
Ulia ukhola amalayi yekholela omwene ne ukhola amabii kali khuye , mana mulikalusibwa ewa Nyasaye wenyu Omulesi
Ne toto khwahelesia Abana ba israeil eshitabu nende amalako nende Aburumwa, mana nikhubakaba emikabo emilayi, nenikhubakholela obulayi muno okhushila Abandu boosi

Mana nikhubahelesia amalako kalolekha kali habulafu, ne shibawukhana tawe halali nibakhanyoola obumanyi, khulwe ishinda yali hakari wabu. Toto Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi alibakabula inyanga yeyindukho khukabawukhananga
Mana nikhukhura khunjila ya makhuwa kano kho iloondekhwo, ne olaloonda obwikombi bwa balia balamaanyile tawe
Abo shibalikhukhonyakhwo shiosi shiosi imbeli wa Nyasaye tawe, ne toto abonooni ni abetsa abeene khubeene, ne Nyasaye ni Omwitsa wabalia bamuria
Bino ni ebimanyisio bia Abandu okhulolelakhwo nende obulunjifu nende tsimbabaasi khubandu bali nende obwatoto
Nohomba abakholi betsimbii baparanga mbu khwakhabakhole shinga balia abasuubila mana nibakhola amalayi nashilala okhumenya khwabu nende okhufwa khwabu? ni obubii buli burie bwababusinjia
Ne Nyasayeyaloongalikulunendeeshialo khubwatoto, ne khobuli Omundu arungwe khukayakhola, nabo shibalikholelwa obubii tawe

Koo walolakhwo ulia wakhola obwikombi bubwe okhuba Nyasaye wuwe, mana Nyasaye namulekha akore, kata nali nende obumanyi, mana nara eshimanyisio khumarwi keke nende khumwoyo kukwe, ne nara khutsimoni tsisie eshiilima, kho owakhamulunjisia niwina nalali Nyasaye, shimwitsulilanga khwo
Ne baboola mbu: “ buno ni obulamu bwokhushialo,	khufwitsanga	ne khumenyanga, ne shibulaho shikhusishia tawe halali tsinyanga,” ne babula obumanyi bwako, halali baparanga butswa
Ne nibasomelwa tsinyaali tsiefu tsiahabulafu babula eshifune halali baboola mbu : “lamusiekhwo bapapa befu nikali mbu muboolanga akatoto.”
Boola mbu: “ Nyasaye niye ubalamusinjia khandi niye ulibafwisia, mana alibakhung’asia inyanga yeyindukho ibulamwo obukanakani, halali Abandu abanji shibamanyile tawe
Ne obwaami bwomwikulu nende khushialo nibwa Nyasaye, ni inyanga yeyindukho olwa yiliula abonooni bakhasikhe
Ne olilola buli omukanda nikusikame hasi, buli omukanda kulangwa okhutsia okhusoma eshitabu shiakwo, “lelo mularungwa kamwakholanga.”
Eshitabu shiefu shino shiboola khwinywe khubwatoto, toto efwe khwahandikanga akamwakholanga
Ne balia basuubila mana nibakhola amalayi , Nyasaye wabu Omulesi alibenjisia mutsimbabaasi tsitsie, okho nikho okhubura khwahabulafu
Ne balia bakhaya baliboolelwa mbu: “ shimwasomelwakho tsinyaali tsianje mana nimuba nende obufuru mumioyo chienyu, mana nimuba Abandu bobwonooni.?”
Ne olwa liliboolwa mbu: “ indache ya Nyasaye niyahabwene ne ebise bibula tsinganakani “nanyu nimuboola mbu: “khukorerwe indukho eyo, khuparirisinjiakhwo butwsa, ne khubula obwatoto.”
Mana obubii bwabakhola bwakhabaloleshele, ne kalibabotokhana akabetseshelesinjia
Baliboolelwa mbu: “olwalelo khubebilila shingala enywe mwebilila omukhung’ano kweyinyanga yenyu ino eshimenyo shienyu nimumulilo ne mubula ubahabina.”
Khulwo khuba enywe mwatseshelela tsinyaali tsia Nyasaye mana obulamu bwokhushialo nibubakatilisia. kholeelo shibalirusibwamwo tawe nohomba shibalileshelwa tawe
Oluyali nilwa Nyasaye Omulesi we likulu , Omulesi weshialo Omulesi webilonjo biosi
Ne obukhongo ni obubwe butswa yenyene, mwikulu nende khushialo, naye ni owa Amaani Omuchesi muno
Ha mim
Ukhwishibwa kheshitabu khurula khu Nyasaye owa Amani Omuchesi muno
Ni shikwaloonga likulu nende eshialo nende biosi bili hakari wabio halali khubwatoto nende ebise biarebwaho, nebalia bakhaya shibabukulilanga oluchendo mukabekanyilisibungwa tawe

Boola mbu:	“mulolangakhwo biamulamanga bilali Nyasaye, munzechesie nishina shabialonga shili khushialo, nohomba bali nende obulala khu walonga likulu, mundererekhwo eshitabu ashialiho imbeli wa shino, nohomba eshimanyisio shiosi shiosi shiobumanyi nikalimbu muboolanga obwatoto”
Ni omukori omukhongo uli arie, ushilakhwo ulamaanga, abalali Nyasaye, ebalalibafuchilila ukhula inyanga yeyindukho, nabo bakorerwe amalaamo kabu
Olwa Abandu balikhung’asibwa baliba abasuku khubo, ne belikaana okhulamwa khwabu
Ne nibasomelwa tsinyaali tsiefu ethili habulafu, abakhayi baboolanga nibakhalola abwatoto mbu: “ buno ni obulosi bwahabulafu.”

Nohomba baboolanga mbu: “yekasiliasa omwene” , boola mbu: “ nikali mbu ndekasilia omwene, enywe shimulikhoonyakhwo shosi shosi imbeli wa Nyasaye tawe, ye amanyile muno kamutiabukhanga, ye niye omuloli hakari wanje ninenyu naye ni omunji wobulilesheli omukoosia muno.”
Boola esie shendi omwishemuli mu Barumwa tawe, ne engorwa ngalandilikholwa nahomba enywe, Enondanga butswa kefimbulilungwa mubufimbuli, Ne shendi shiosi shiosi tawe halali omwikanyilisi wa habulafu

Boola: “mulola murie nikali mbu kano karula khu Nyasaye mana mukakhaye mana abeho omuloli okhurula mu Baana ba Isaraeli, shinga kano, mana asuubile nanyu mukhaye,” Toto Nyasaye shalunjisinjia betsimbi tawe
Ne abakhayi baboolela abasuubila mbu “kabetsanga kano mbu namalayi shibakhakhuranjilile tawe”	ne olwabakhaya okhulunjikha baboola mbu : “buno ni obubeyi bwakhale.”
Ne imbeli wuwe shaliho eshitabu shia Musa, Shiobulunjifu nende tsimbabaasi, na shino ni eshitabu shitinyisia shiolulimi olwarabu, kho shikanyilisie abetsimbi ne shibasuubisie abakholi bamalayi
Toto balia baboola mbu: “ Nyasaye wefu omulesi ni Allah..(Nyasaye) “ mana nibaba abalunjifu, shibaliba nobuyendi tawe nohomba shibalibeelela tawe.”
Abo nibo Abandu bomwikulu, balimenyamwo tsinyanga tsiosi, Omurungo khukabakholanga

Khwachelela omundu akholele abebusi bebe bibili amalayi, Nyina Mwana yamuchinga munda khukhusanda ne namwibula khukhunyakhana, okhumuchinga,	munda	nende okhumuleshesia okhununa ni emiesi amakhumi kataru, okhula ngala yola omundu omukhongo mana niyola emika amakhumi kane, naboola mbu: “Nyasaye wanje omulesi nyalile enyoole okhupa orio khutsimbaabasi tsitsio tsiawambelesia nende khu abebusi banje ne ekhole amalayi kakhuchamisia, ne ungasilie olwibulo lwanje, esie ndikanile khwiwe, ne esie toto endi mubasalamu.”
Abo nibo bakhuchamilanga abikhole biabu biabakholanga, ne khubaleshela tsimbi tsiabu ne baliba mu bandu bomwikulu, indache yatoto yabalakungwa

Ne ulia wekhandila abebusi bebe babili, nababoolela mbu : “murisinjia mbu ndililamusibwa ne lwabura olwibulo olunji neshili okhubaho,” ne abebusi abo basabanga obukhoonyi khu Nyasaye nibaboola mbu: “ abaane ewe suubila toto indache ya Nyasaye niyatoto” naye aboola mbu: “ni shinashino? Atsikhali butswa tsingano tsiabakhale.”
Abo nibo bamakhuwa kabu kabusibwa mubandu babura imbeli wabu Mumajini nende Abandu, Toto abo banyoola okhusikha
Ne boosi baliba nende ebichelo bikabukhane khukabakhola, kho abarunje ebikhole biabu nabo shibalikholelwa obubii tawe

Ne inyanga yabakhayi balirerwa mumulilo, baliboolelwa mbu: “mwamala okhubukula ebilayi bienyu khubulamu bwokhushialo, mana nimubwikhoyela, kho lelo luno murungwa eshinyasio shietsisoni khulwa okhufura khwenyu khushialo khunjila ilali yatoto, Nende khulwa amabii kenyu kamwakholanga.”

Ne itsulila omusiani wababu A’d, olwa yekanyilisia abandu be khumatulo koluyeshe, ne toto abekanyilisi abanji babura imbeli nende inyuma wuwe, nibaboola mbu: “Mulalaama shiosi shiosi tawe halali Nyasaye, esie abalolela eshisa eshinyasio shieinyanga ikhongo.”
Baboola mbu: “witsile okhukhukabukhasia nende Abanyasaye befu, mana khurerere kokhulakanga ako noli mubalia baboolanga obwatoto.”
